Omuddo ogubeera mu gonja gumukosa nnyo.
Omuddo ogwo ogubeera mu gonja gweetaaga ne gukoolebwa mangu.
Ng'omulimi, weetaaga okuwa gonja wo obudde obumala.
Oteekeddwa okwebuuza ku mulimisa ku bikwata ku gonja.
Kkampuni ki esinga okusuubula gonja eyo ewammwe?
Ennimiro eno yeetaaga kati kulimamu gonja.
Ebigimusa bino bijja kunkolera nnyo ku gonja ono.
Okulima gonja tekweetaaga nnyo ssente za ntandikwa.
Omuddo oguli mu gonja osobola okugukuulamu n'engalo.
Abakyala bangi bettanidde nnyo okulima gonja.
Lwaki abantu abamu tebaagala kulima gonja?
Olulima lwa gonja olwasembayo lwonna lwansala.
Kiwuka ki ekyakaza gonja wo?
Oteekeddwa okufuna endu ya gonja gwe weekakasa.
Olowooza gonja ono anaabala okusinga gwe wasooka okusimba?
Totereka kigimusa kya gonja wantu wayiika mazzi kuba kiba kifa.
Ettaka kw'osimba gonja lirina okubeeramu amazzi agamala.
Lwaki gonja w'ennaku zino awanvuwa nnyo?
Ddagala ki eriyinza okutta ekiwuka ekikaza gonja?
Buli lw'olwawo okukungula gonja ayonoone.
Muddo ki ogutalina buzibu ku gonja?
Omuddo tegulina buzibu ku gonja wange?
Abakugu bagamba nti tuteekeddwa okukoola amangu gonja waffe.
Tolina kuganya gonja wo kulwa nnyo mu nnimiro kuba ayonooneka.
Nnasimba gonja mungi naye teyamera yenna.
Twasimba gonja mungi naye yagaana okubala.
Lwaki gonja wange yagaana okubala ku mulundi guno?
Ettaka lyaffe lino liddako bulungi gonja.
Omwaka guno ssibazidda gonja era ssisuubira kufunamu nnyo.
Lwaki awantu awo tosimbawo gonja?
Enkuba gye tusuubira okutonnya ejja kutuyamba ku gonja waffe.
Omuzira ogwatukuba gwayonoona nnyo gonja waffe.
Omuntu amanyi obukulu bw'okulima gonja talumbibwa njala.
Abalimi ba gonja balabuddwa ku kyeya kye bayolekedde.
Kiki ekyatuuka ku musajja eyali alima gonja wano?
Omusana omungi gukosa gutya gonja?
Bintu ki ebisinga okwonoona gonja?
Ebintu ebyonoona gonja bifiiriza nnyo abalimi baffe.
Lwaki abalimi ba gonja batono nnyo mu biseera bino?
Okulabirira gonja kya nkizo nnyo mu bulimi.
Kusoomoozebwa ki okusinga okusangibwa mu kulima gonja.
Abantu abansinga balowooza tosobola kufuna mu gonja.
Kizibu okusanga omwana atamanyi gonja bw'afaanana.
Kika kya gonja ki ekisinga okulimibwa wano mu uganda?
Ettaka lino lisobola okuddako buli kika kya gonja.
Mmenyeraayo ebika bya gonja by'omanyi byonna.
Lwaki ennima ya gonja ekyuse nnyo ensangi zino?
Okusimba gonja kikwetaagisa okubaako emitendera gy'ogoberera.
Mitendera ki emikulu egigobererwa mu kusimba gonja?
Sooka omanye obungi bw'amazzi agali mu ttaka nga tonnasimba gonja.
Olina okwebuuza ku mulimisa nga tonnasimba gonja.
Kigimusa ki kye wakozesa ku gonja wo?
Lwaki abalimi tebasooka kukebera ttaka nga tebannasimba gonja?
Ebigimusa ebizungu bye nnakazesa gonja byayonoona ettaka.
Lwaki abalimi tebamala kwebuuza ku balimisa nga tennasimba gonja?
Omuntu ayagala okulima gonja alina kukola atya?
Omuntu ayagala okulima gonja oyinza kumuwa magezi ki?
Faayo okulaba ng'osimba gonja anaabala obulungi.
Omuntu asimbye endu ya gonja n'etamera oyinza kumuwabula otya?
Kimera ki ekirungi okusimba ng'oggyeko gonja?
Biki ebirina okufiibwako ng'onaasimba gonja?
Tulina ebika bya gonja bimeka wano mu uganda?
Olina kwerinda bintu ki singa obeera olima gonja?
Lwaki ekika kya gonja ekyo kiwanvuwa nnyo?
Mpaayo ekika kya gonja ky'omanyi ekitawanvuwa.
Mpulira bubi nnyo olw'okuba gonja wange yagaana okumera.
Mbeera ki eyeetaagisa okusimbiramu gonja?
Bw'olaba osimbye gonja faayo okumukoola nga bukyali?
Oyo gonja ateekeddwa kulabirirwa mu ngeri ki?
Fuba nnyo okulaba nti gonja tazika.
Buli gonja lw'azika kiteeka enfunayo ng'omulimi mu katyabaga.
Awantu w'ogenda okusimba gonja sooka okabalewo.
Lwaki batukubiriza okukaba we tugenda okusimba gonja?
Eyakuwa amagezi osimbe gonja osaana owebaze nnyo.
Ate eyakuwa amagezi ove kukulima gonja yali takwagaliza.
Mukyala wange yasanyuka nnyo nga gonja we abaze.
Nsiziira ku ki okumanya nti gonja ono agenda kubala?
Kya bulijjo nti gonja asobola okugaana okubala.
Nnansimbe ntya gonja ono asobole okubala?
Nnina kukola ntya gonja ono asobole okugejja?
Gendera ku magezi omulimisa g'akuwa singa obeera osimba gonja.
Omulimi yenna ava ku magezi g'omulimisa ku nsimba ya gonja talina kwejjusa.
Ono gonja alina kumala bbanga ki mu nnimiro?
Ani alina okusalawo ebbanga ly'okukungulirako gonja?
Njagala kuyiga ngeri ya kusimbamu gonja.
Mwezi ki omulungi okusimbiramu gonja?
Ani yakuwa amagezi okuyingira obulimi bwa gonja?
Olinayo essuubi ly'onna okuva mu bulimi bwa gonja?
Olina essuubi okuddamu okulima gonja?
Bannassaayansi baatandika okumerusa endu za gonja.
Okulima gonja nakwo kati kuyingiddemu tekinologiya.
Omuntu ababirira anaalabirira gonja we ajja kumufunamu.
Tewali nkola nnambulukufu ng'ogenda kusimba gonja.
Bannassaayansi baatandika okunoonyereza ku kiwuka ekikaza gonja.
Kikunta eyakunta yayonoona gonja yenna.
Bannassaayansi baazuddeyo ekika kya gonja ekipya.
Ekika kya gonja kino kikula mangu nnyo okusinga ebirala.
Lwaki ekika kya gonja kino tekyataaga nnyo kigimusa?
Ekika kya gonja kino tekyeetaaga kuteekako kigimusa.
Ekika kya gonja ekyakoleddwa kiriko nnyo ku katale.
Ani ayinza okutufunira akatale ka gonja waffe?
Simba gonja wadde tonnaba kufuna katale.
Omulimi wa gonja asaanye afeeyo ku kunoonya akatale.
Buli lw'osimba gonja n'otanoonya katale ayinza okukudibirira.
Abantu bangi abasobola okuwa gonja gwe tusimba akatale.
Ettaka lino lindabikira obutaddako gonja.
Lwaki olowooza ettaka lino teriddako gonja?
Weewale okusimba gonja nga tosoose kukebera ttaka.
Okukebera ettaka nga tonnasimba gonja kikulu nnyo.
Bw'okebera ettaka nga tonnasimba gonja omanya ebirungo ebiri mu ttaka.
Omulimi akebedde ettaka nga tannasimba gonja era asobola okumanya ebirungo ebitali mu ttaka.
Ekirungo ekitali mu ttaka osobola okukiteekamu nga tonnasimba gonja.
Ebirungo ebiri mu ttaka bye bibaza gonja.
Era ebirungo ebitali mu ttaka bye bigaana gonja okubala.
Emirundi egimu ebirungo bino bisobola okugaana gonja okumera.
Ebbulwa ly'ebirungo mu ttaka kisobola okulemesa gonja okuwanvuwa.
Ebirungo by'omu ttaka bwe bibaamu nga bingi olwo gonja aba ajja kubala.
Ekikolo kya gonja kino kirungi nnyo.
Tolaba ng'ekikolo kya gonja kino kyabala nnyo.
Ekikolo kya gonja kino kimazeewo bbanga ki?
Ennimiro ya gonja eno ogisuubiramu ssente mmeka?
Lwaki gonja ono omusuubiramu ssente nnyingi?
Abasuubuzi abaasooka okulima gonja baafunira ddala ssente.
Gavumenti enoonye gy'esobola okutunda gonja waffe.
Omusajja oyo aludde mu bulimi bwa gonja.
Abalimi abamu gonja waabwe bamutundira ku mutimbagano.
Tuli kukola ki okwongera ku katale ka gonja kuno?
Gavumenti esaanye eyambe abalimi ba gonja nabo basobole okumufunamu.
Buli lwe tuzisa gonja tubeera twolekera nja etagambika.
Omuntu atamanyi kirungi kiri mu gonja asaana kubagulizaako.
Kika kya gonja ki ky'oteekateeka okusimba awo?
Fuuyira ekigimusa ky'amazzi ku gonja asobole okubala.
Ekigimusa kya nnakavundira kigezza nnyo gonja.
Ettaka bwe likaddiwa libeera terikyabalako gonja.
Omuntu y'asobola okuwa obudde ekirime kya gonja.
Lwaki ebigimusa bya gonja bya bbula nnyo ensangi zino?
Ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kulima gonja byangu nnyo okufuna.
Ekirime kya gonja kye kimu ku byettanirwa ensangi zino.
Eggwanga lirimu abalimi ba gonja bangi nnyo.
Lwaki gonja wa kati akulira mu bbanga ttono?
Emirembe gye tulina mu ggwanga gitusobozesezza okumalira obudde bwaffe ku gonja.
Embeera gonja ono gy'alimu eweera ddala essanyu.
Ani yakuzigirira nti okulima gonja kulimu nnyo ssente.
Fuba okulaba nti olima gonja ali ku mutindo.
Kigimusa ki ekizungu ekikola ennyo ku gonja ono omupya?
Ettaka kwe twalimanga gonja n'abala kati lyonna likaddiye.
Tolagajjalira kulima gonja kubanga alimu nnyo ekirungo kye tweetaaga.
Kiriisa ki ekisangibwa mu gonja?
Enkya tulinayo okuliiko ng'abalimi ba gonja.
Biteeso ki bye mwayogeddeko ng'abali ba gonja?
Olukiiko lw'abalimi ba gonja lwetabiddwamu omubaka waffe ow'ekitundu.
Omubaka w'ekitundu yagumizza abalimi ba gonja nti ebbeeyi ejja kulinnya.
Twekubidde omulanga eri omubaka waffe atuyambe okutufunira ku katale ka gonja.
Ekirime kya gonja kidda bulungi mu kitundu kino.
Buli lw'osimba gonja mu kitundu ekirimu akasana faayo nnyo okumufukirira.
Omusenyu tegusobola kuddako gonja nga bwe kiri ku ttaka eriddugavu.
Endu ya gonja olina kugiggya mu batunzi b'endu abakakasiddwa.
Si buli gw'oba ng'atunda endu za gonja nti atunda ntuufu.
Okulima gonja kusaanidde okutwalibwa ng'omulimu oguyinza okuggya abantu mu bwavu.
Waliwo eyangamba nti gonja alimibwa bakadde.
Wamma kituufu nti gonja alimibwa bakadde?
Kika kya gonja ki ky'oyagala okusiga?
Maama wo yasimba kika kya gonja ki?
Maama waabwe yagaana okulima gonja kati yejjusa.
Tojja kusobola kuweerera baana abo nga tolima gonja.
Obugagga obuli mu gonja tewali ayinza kubukutendera.
Buli lw'olowooza ku kirime ekifuna ekiralu lowooza ku gonja.
Olina okukimanya nti gonja alimiddwa abantu bangi era ne bamufunamu.
Wabula kino tekiggyawo nti waliwo abalimye gonja n'abasala.
Maama yagaana okuddamu okulima gonja okuva lwe yamusala.
Omwaka gwe nnalima gonja n'ansala yantamisa okulima.
Obulimi bwa gonja bweetaaga omuntu ng'asobola okwerabira ebibaddewo.
Omwaka guno ssigenda kusimba gonja kuba owa luli yansala nnyo.
Olina okumanya ekiruubirirwa kyo nga tonnatandika kulima gonja.
Buli lw'oyingira obulimi bwa gonja nga tolina kiruubirirwa oba tomanyi ky'oyagala.
Obuvunaanyizibwa bwo mu kulima gonja buli wa?
Weetaaga ssente mmeka mu gonja wo?
Omulimi alina n'okubeera n'omuwendo gwa ssente gw'asuubira mu gonja yenna.
Ono gonja yenna ogenda kumutunda lumu?
Abatera okutunda gonja olumu batera okufunamu ennyo.
Lwaki gonja wo tomutunda lumu yenna?
Njagala kufunayo akadde nnoonyeze gonja wange akatale.
Abalimi bangi bajja ne balambula gonja wange.
Abalimi abajja okulambula gonja wange mbawa ku magezi g'okulima gonja.
Buli lw'ogabana amagezi ne balimi banno aba gonja naawe ofuna okumanya.
Amagezi agampeebwa omulimisa gannyambye okubaza gonja.
Fuba okulaba nti weebuuza ku balimi banno ku ky'otamanyi ku gonja.
Lambula ku gonja wo olabe oba taliimu birwadde.
Ebirwadde bya gonja bifiiriza nnyo abalimi.
Okulima gonja okumazeemu bbanga ki?
Ffe twasooka gonja w'ekika kino mu kitundu kino.
Omwaka oguwedde gonja wange yatuukira mu kidibo.
Abantu bangi baabonaabona nnyo ne gonja omwaka oguwedde.
Ggwe gonja wo wamutunda wa?
Ani yakuzigirira akatale ka gonja we kaali?
Lwaki tewambuulirako gye watunda gonja wo?
Bw'ofuna akatale ka gonja nange ontemyako.
Bannange abalima gonja nnabafunira akatale.
Toyinza kufuna katale ka gonja n'okotoggera mulimi munno.
Abalimi ba gonja bakolagana nnyo.
Abalimi ba gonja okukolagana kubayambye okukulaakulana.
Buli lw'olima gonja nga tolina nkolagana ne banno ayinza okukudibirira.
Ffenna twalima gonja naye obweraliikirivu bwatuli ku katale ke.
Bwe twakizuula nti tetulina katale ka gonja ne tutandika okukanoonya.
Mu kunoonya akatale ka gonja era twasanga okusoomoozebwa kungi.
Ani asinga okugula gonja eyo mu kitundu kyammwe.
Omusajja eyali agula gonja eno ewaffe yafa.
Omusajja eyali agula gonja waffe yali atudondola nnyo.
Bw'olima gonja omungi abamu bagutwala ng'omukisa okukudondola.
Osobola okulima gonja ne weerabira olunaku lwe wamusimba.
Nze sijjukira ddagala lye nnafuuyira ku gonja wange.
Ekigimusa kye nnakozesa ku gonja ono nakyo nnakyerabira.
Buli lw'okoseza ekigimusa ekisukkiridde ku gonja ayonooneka.
Okunoonya akatale ka gonja bwe bwetaavu bwe tusinga okubeera nabwo.
Omukulembeze w'eggwanga yatusuubiza okutufunira akatale ka gonja.
Tubanguddwa mu ngeri y'okwongera omutindo ku gonja.
We twogerera gonja waffe akwata ekifo kya kumwanjo nnyo ku katale k'ensi yonna.
Amawanga g'ebweru gatandise okusuubula gonja waffe.
Ennaku zino gonja waffe ayagalwa buli ggwanga.
Eggwanga erigaana gonja waffe liba terimanyi kye lyagala.
Naffe tukimanyi nti omutindo gwa gonja waffe mulungi.
Kiki ekiviirako omutindo ogwa wansi mu gonja?
Abalimi balina kukola ki okutumbula omutindo gwa gonja?
Lupimo ki oluliwo kw'osinziira okulaba nti gonja ono mulungi?
Bwe mbeera situukirizza lupimo olwo ku gonja wange kiki ekikolebwa?
Abantu bangi tebamanyi birungi biri mu kulima gonja?
Ebirungi ebiri mu kulima gonja wabizuula otya?
Lwaki mu birime byonna era walondawo gonja?
Oteekeddwa okuba ng'olina ekyakusikiriza okulima gonja.
Ani yakuyingiza mu bulimi bwa gonja?
Ani yakusikiriza okutandika okulima gonja?
Birungi ki by'ofunye okuva lwe watandika okulima gonja?
Osuubira onaakoma ddi okulima gonja?
Wali olowoozezza ku kuwummula obulimi bwa gonja?
Ettaka liteekeddwa kulimibwako gonja emirundi emeka?
Buli lwe ssirima gonja mbulwa nnyo ssente ewaka.
Oteekeddwa okukimanya nti okulima gonja kwava dda wano mu uganda.
Ekibbattaka kigootaanyizza obulimi bwa gonja eno ewaffe.
Ekitundu kyaffe kimanyiddwa lwa bulimi bwa gonja.
Singa twali tetulima nnyo gonja abantu tebanditutegedde.
Ggwanga ki erisinga okulima gonja mu nsi yonna?
Omulimi alina okukimanya nti gonja asobola okufa singa tamulabirira bulungi.
Ebintu ebiyinza okutta gonja bingi nnyo.
Biki by'omanyi ebiyinza okuviirako gonja obutamera.
Embeera y'obudde embi mw'osimbidde gonja eyinza okumugaana okumera.
Endu ya gonja enfu nayo eyinza okugaana okumera.
Singa osimba gonja mu musana omungi ennyo ayinza okugaana okumera.
Singa gonja tafuna mazzi gamala mu ttaka era tamera.
Obuwuka obuli mu ttaka singa bulya endu era gonja tamera.
Singa gonja ayokyebwa oluyiira era ayonooneka.
Omulimi alina okubeera omwegendereza ennyo ng'alabirira gonja we.
Si kya tteeka nti gonja bw'amera nti olwo ogenda kumufunamu.
Oyinza okusimba gonja n'amera naye omusana bwe gumukwata era n'afa.
Omusajja oyo yasimba gonja naye yakona.
Waliwo gonja lw'amera kyokka n'agaana okuwanvuwa.
Omusana kimu ku bintu ebigaana gonja okuwanvuwa.
Kiki ekirala ekiviira gonja okukonzibira mu nnimiro.
Enkuba esukkiridde yo erina buzibu ki ku gonja?
Lwaki kigambibwa nti musana gwokka gwe gusinga okukonzibya gonja?
Ettaka lyo teririna kye likola ku kukonziba kwa gonja?
Kiki ekiyinza okutuukawo singa osimba gonja ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Lwaki omulimi yandisimbye gonja ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Wali olabye ku muntu abazizza gonja ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Kiki ekiyinza okuwaliriza omuntu okulima gonja ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Omuntu asimbye gonja ku ttaka ly'olunnyo ayinza kukola atya okumufunamu?
Omuntu asimbye gonja ku ttaka ly'olunnyo ayinza okuviiramu awo.
Omulimi yantegeeza nti gonja gwe yasimba yayengera ebikoola.
Kiki ekiviirako ebikoola bya gonja okufuuka ebya kyenvu?
Buli gonja lw'abeera n'ebikoola ebya kyenvu omanya waliwo ekirungo ekibula mu ttaka.
Lwaki tukubirizibwa obutasimba gonja ku ttaka lya lunnyo?
Omulimisa yangaana okusimba gonja mu kifo ekyo.
Bw'osimba gonja ku ttaka ly'olunnyo omuteekamu ssente nnyingi.
Ekigimusa kigenda kingi nnyo ku gonja asimbiddwa ku ttaka ery'olunnyo.
Ebbeeyi y'ekigimusa kya gonja eri waggulu nnyo.
Ettaka ly'olunnyo terisobola kuddako bulungi gonja.
Buli lw'olima gonja ku ttaka eritaliimu biriisa bimala akusala.
Buli lw'olima gonja ku ttaka ery'olunnyo muteekamu ssente nnyingi.
Gy'okoma okuteeka ssente mu bigimusa bya gonja gy'okoma okukendeeza amagoba.
Ettaka kw'ogenda okusimba gonja walikebera?
Kya nkizo nnyo n'osimba gonja ku ttaka eddungi.
Bulijjo tukubirizibwa okuwebuuza ku balimisa nga tetunnasimba birime nga gonja.
Abantu abasinga balowooza tebasaanye kwebuuza nga basimba gonja.
Lwaki omulimi yandibadde akabeza ettaka kw'agenda okulima gonja?
Kiki ekiyinza okutuukawo singa nsimba gonja nga ssikebedde ttaka?
Omulimi asimba gonja nga takebezza ttaka aba amenye tteeka ki?
Nze bukyanga nsimba gonja ssikebezanga ku ttaka.
Okwebuuza ku mulimisa nga sinnasimba gonja ono kyannyamba nnyo.
Buli lw'olisimba gonja mu kiseera ky'omusana kimanye nti akusaze.
Olina okuteeba ekiseera ky'okusimbiramu gonja ekituufu.
Ensuba esaanye ebeera ng'etonnya mu kiseera ky'osimbiramu gonja wo.
Topapa kusimba gonja olw'okuba olabye enkuba esooka.
Enkuba esooka oluusi ewubya nnyo abalimi ba gonja.
Enkuba bw'etonnya sooka weebuuze ku mulimisa oba osaanye osimbe gonja wo.
Buli lw'opapa okusimba gonja oluusi ofundikira ofiiriddwa.
Obulimi bwa gonja kati mbukugukiddemu ddala.
Nze omu ku balimi abasinga okulima gonja mu ggwanga.
Era nze nkiikirira abalimi ba gonja ku lukiiko lwaffe olw'abalimi.
Tewali kiyinza kugenda mu maaso ku bulimi bwa gonja nga ssikimanyiiko.
Nze omu ku balimi abeebuuzibwako ku bikwata ku gonja.
Tulafuubanye nnyo okukulaakulanya obulimi bwa gonja mu ggwanga.
Abantu abamu baasooka kutugaya nga tutandika okulima gonja.
Nze nnali mumalirivu nnyo era nze nnasooka okulima gonja ku mutala guno.
Tolina kubulwa ssente ng'ate osobola okuziggya mu gonja.
Obulimi bwa gonja buyimiridde butya eyo ewammwe?
Eyo ewammwe gonja mumusimba mu kiseera ki?
Nsigo ya gonja ki gye musinga okusimba eyo ewammwe?
Gavumenti ebayambye etya mu bulimi bwammwe obwa gonja?
Lwaki tetulina mateeka galambika nnima ya gonja mu ggwanga?
Obudde bwe tumala nga tulima gonja bungi nnyo.
Abagula gonja basaanye beekube mu mitima batuwe ku ssente eziwera.
Tekiba kya bwenkanya omuntu okutwala gonja wo nga takuwadde ssente.
Abasuubuzi ba gonja abasinga batulyazaamaanya.
Ssente ze wateeka mu kulima gonja waziggya wa?
Waliwo lwe nneewola ssente ne nziteeka mu kulima gonja.
Okulima gonja tekwandibadde kuzibu naye tetulina bigimusa.
N'okufuna akatale ka gonja eno ewaffe osiitaana.
Abantu bangi baasimba gonja naye batubidde naye.
Lwaki gavumenti tetugulaako gonja waffe.
Ebbeeyi ya gonja eri wansi nnyo.
Gavumenti eteekewo bbeeyi ya gonja gye baba balina okumugulirako.
Gavumenti tevuddeeyo kuyamba balimi ba gonja.
Osanga gavumenti bw'eteekawo omuwendo ogugulirwako gonja tunaaganyulwa.
Abatalima gonja ate be basinga okumufumamu.
Nja kuva ku kulima gonja ntandike kusuubula awedde.
Ebbeeyi ya gonja yatuuka ekiseera n'ennemerera.
Abatugulako gonja babeera nga abatuyamba obuyambi.
Ebbanga lye nnamala mu bulimi bwa gonja lyantamya obulimi.
Omusuubuzi wa gonja afunira ddala okusinga eyalima.
Omusuubuzi wa gonja anyigiriza nnyo omuli.
Naye lwaki omusuubuzi wa gonja anyigiriza nnyo omulimi?
Omusuubuzi wa gonja bw'akimaya nti olina akizibu awo nga kumpi agenda kutwala wa bwereere.
Abalimi ba gonja be balina okugereka ebbeeyi kwe batundira.
Ggwe gonja wo wamutundira ku bbeeyi ki?
Kiki ekyakusikiriza okutundira gonja ku bbeeyi eya wansi?
Ssente ze nnafuna mu gonja kyenkana nninga ataalima.
Tewali kinnyiiza nga muntu kutuuka ku gonja wange n'amulekawo.
Abasuubuzi ba gonja mu butuufu batuwa ssente ntono nnyo.

Ebintu ebisoomooza abali ba gonja bijja kukolwako gavumenti.

Ettaka lino lindabikira obutaddako ssukaalindiizi.

Weewale okusimba ssukaalindiizi nga tosoose kukebera ttaka.

Ebirungo ebiri mu ttaka bye bibaza ssukaalindiizi.
Era ebirungo ebitali mu ttaka bye bigaana ssukaalindiizi okubala.

Ekigimusa kya nnakavundira kigezza nnyo ssukaalindiizi.

Omuntu y'asobola okuwa obudde ekirime kya ssukaalindiizi.
Lwaki ebigimusa bya ssukaalindiizi bya bbula nnyo ensangi zino?
Ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kulima ssukaalindiizi byangu nnyo okufuna.

Eggwanga lirimu abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi bangi nnyo.
Lwaki ssukaalindiizi wa kati akulira mu bbanga ttono?
Emirembe gye tulina mu ggwanga gitusobozesezza okumalira obudde bwaffe ku ssukaalindiizi.
Embeera ssukaalindiizi ono gy'alimu eweera ddala essanyu.
Ani yakuzigirira nti okulima ssukaalindiizi kulimu nnyo ssente.
Fuba okulaba nti olima ssukaalindiizi ali ku mutindo.
Kigimusa ki ekizungu ekikola ennyo ku ssukaalindiizi ono omupya?
Ettaka kwe twalimanga ssukaalindiizi n'abala kati lyonna likaddiye.
Tolagajjalira kulima ssukaalindiizi kubanga alimu nnyo ekirungo kye tweetaaga.
Kiriisa ki ekisangibwa mu ssukaalindiizi?
Enkya tulinayo okuliiko ng'abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi.
Biteeso ki bye mwayogeddeko ng'abali ba ssukaalindiizi?
Olukiiko lw'abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi lwetabiddwamu omubaka waffe ow'ekitundu.
Omubaka w'ekitundu yagumizza abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi nti ebbeeyi ejja kulinnya.
Twekubidde omulanga eri omubaka waffe atuyambe okutufunira ku katale ka ssukaalindiizi.
Ekirime kya ssukaalindiizi kidda bulungi mu kitundu kino.
Buli lw'osimba ssukaalindiizi mu kitundu ekirimu akasana faayo nnyo okumufukirira.
Omusenyu tegusobola kuddako ssukaalindiizi nga bwe kiri ku ttaka eriddugavu.
Endu ya ssukaalindiizi olina kugiggya mu batunzi b'endu abakakasiddwa.
Si buli gw'oba ng'atunda endu za ssukaalindiizi nti atunda ntuufu.
Okulima ssukaalindiizi kusaanidde okutwalibwa ng'omulimu oguyinza okuggya abantu mu bwavu.
Waliwo eyangamba nti ssukaalindiizi alimibwa bakadde.
Wamma kituufu nti ssukaalindiizi alimibwa bakadde?
Kika kya ssukaalindiizi ki ky'oyagala okusiga?
Maama wo yasimba kika kya ssukaalindiizi ki?
Maama waabwe yagaana okulima ssukaalindiizi kati yejjusa.
Tojja kusobola kuweerera baana abo nga tolima ssukaalindiizi.
Obugagga obuli mu ssukaalindiizi tewali ayinza kubukutendera.
Buli lw'olowooza ku kirime ekifuna ekiralu lowooza ku ssukaalindiizi.
Olina okukimanya nti ssukaalindiizi alimiddwa abantu bangi era ne bamufunamu.
Wabula kino tekiggyawo nti waliwo abalimye ssukaalindiizi n'abasala.
Maama yagaana okuddamu okulima ssukaalindiizi okuva lwe yamusala.
Omwaka gwe nnalima ssukaalindiizi n'ansala yantamisa okulima.
Obulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi bweetaaga omuntu ng'asobola okwerabira ebibaddewo.
Omwaka guno ssigenda kusimba ssukaalindiizi kuba owa luli yansala nnyo.
Olina okumanya ekiruubirirwa kyo nga tonnatandika kulima ssukaalindiizi.
Buli lw'oyingira obulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi nga tolina kiruubirirwa oba tomanyi ky'oyagala.
Obuvunaanyizibwa bwo mu kulima ssukaalindiizi buli wa?
Weetaaga ssente mmeka mu ssukaalindiizi wo?
Omulimi alina n'okubeera n'omuwendo gwa ssente gw'asuubira mu ssukaalindiizi yenna.
Ono ssukaalindiizi yenna ogenda kumutunda lumu?
Abatera okutunda ssukaalindiizi olumu batera okufunamu ennyo.
Lwaki ssukaalindiizi wo tomutunda lumu yenna?
Njagala kufunayo akadde nnoonyeze ssukaalindiizi wange akatale.
Abalimi bangi bajja ne balambula ssukaalindiizi wange.
Abalimi abajja okulambula ssukaalindiizi wange mbawa ku magezi g'okulima ssukaalindiizi.
Buli lw'ogabana amagezi ne balimi banno aba ssukaalindiizi naawe ofuna okumanya.
Amagezi agampeebwa omulimisa gannyambye okubaza ssukaalindiizi.
Fuba okulaba nti weebuuza ku balimi banno ku ky'otamanyi ku ssukaalindiizi.
Lambula ku ssukaalindiizi wo olabe oba taliimu birwadde.
Ebirwadde bya ssukaalindiizi bifiiriza nnyo abalimi.
Okulima ssukaalindiizi okumazeemu bbanga ki?
Ffe twasooka ssukaalindiizi w'ekika kino mu kitundu kino.
Omwaka oguwedde ssukaalindiizi wange yatuukira mu kidibo.
Abantu bangi baabonaabona nnyo ne ssukaalindiizi omwaka oguwedde.
Ggwe ssukaalindiizi wo wamutunda wa?
Ani yakuzigirira akatale ka ssukaalindiizi we kaali?
Lwaki tewambuulirako gye watunda ssukaalindiizi wo?
Bw'ofuna akatale ka ssukaalindiizi nange ontemyako.
Bannange abalima ssukaalindiizi nnabafunira akatale.
Toyinza kufuna katale ka ssukaalindiizi n'okotoggera mulimi munno.
Abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi bakolagana nnyo.
Abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi okukolagana kubayambye okukulaakulana.
Buli lw'olima ssukaalindiizi nga tolina nkolagana ne banno ayinza okukudibirira.
Ffenna twalima ssukaalindiizi naye obweraliikirivu bwatuli ku katale ke.
Bwe twakizuula nti tetulina katale ka ssukaalindiizi ne tutandika okukanoonya.
Mu kunoonya akatale ka ssukaalindiizi era twasanga okusoomoozebwa kungi.
Ani asinga okugula ssukaalindiizi eyo mu kitundu kyammwe.
Omusajja eyali agula ssukaalindiizi eno ewaffe yafa.
Omusajja eyali agula ssukaalindiizi waffe yali atudondola nnyo.
Bw'olima ssukaalindiizi omungi abamu bagutwala ng'omukisa okukudondola.
Osobola okulima ssukaalindiizi ne weerabira olunaku lwe wamusimba.
Nze sijjukira ddagala lye nnafuuyira ku ssukaalindiizi wange.
Ekigimusa kye nnakozesa ku ssukaalindiizi ono nakyo nnakyerabira.
Buli lw'okoseza ekigimusa ekisukkiridde ku ssukaalindiizi ayonooneka.
Okunoonya akatale ka ssukaalindiizi bwe bwetaavu bwe tusinga okubeera nabwo.
Omukulembeze w'eggwanga yatusuubiza okutufunira akatale ka ssukaalindiizi.
Tubanguddwa mu ngeri y'okwongera omutindo ku ssukaalindiizi.
We twogerera ssukaalindiizi waffe akwata ekifo kya kumwanjo nnyo ku katale k'ensi yonna.
Amawanga g'ebweru gatandise okusuubula ssukaalindiizi waffe.
Ennaku zino ssukaalindiizi waffe ayagalwa buli ggwanga.
Eggwanga erigaana ssukaalindiizi waffe liba terimanyi kye lyagala.
Naffe tukimanyi nti omutindo gwa ssukaalindiizi waffe mulungi.
Kiki ekiviirako omutindo ogwa wansi mu ssukaalindiizi?
Abalimi balina kukola ki okutumbula omutindo gwa ssukaalindiizi?
Lupimo ki oluliwo kw'osinziira okulaba nti ssukaalindiizi ono mulungi?
Bwe mbeera situukirizza lupimo olwo ku ssukaalindiizi wange kiki ekikolebwa?
Abantu bangi tebamanyi birungi biri mu kulima ssukaalindiizi?
Ebirungi ebiri mu kulima ssukaalindiizi wabizuula otya?
Lwaki mu birime byonna era walondawo ssukaalindiizi?
Oteekeddwa okuba ng'olina ekyakusikiriza okulima ssukaalindiizi.
Ani yakuyingiza mu bulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi?
Ani yakusikiriza okutandika okulima ssukaalindiizi?
Birungi ki by'ofunye okuva lwe watandika okulima ssukaalindiizi?
Osuubira onaakoma ddi okulima ssukaalindiizi?
Wali olowoozezza ku kuwummula obulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi?
Ettaka liteekeddwa kulimibwako ssukaalindiizi emirundi emeka?
Buli lwe ssirima ssukaalindiizi mbulwa nnyo ssente ewaka.
Oteekeddwa okukimanya nti okulima ssukaalindiizi kwava dda wano mu uganda.
Ekibbattaka kigootaanyizza obulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi eno ewaffe.
Ekitundu kyaffe kimanyiddwa lwa bulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi.
Singa twali tetulima nnyo ssukaalindiizi abantu tebanditutegedde.
Ggwanga ki erisinga okulima ssukaalindiizi mu nsi yonna?
Omulimi alina okukimanya nti ssukaalindiizi asobola okufa singa tamulabirira bulungi.
Ebintu ebiyinza okutta ssukaalindiizi bingi nnyo.
Biki by'omanyi ebiyinza okuviirako ssukaalindiizi obutamera.
Embeera y'obudde embi mw'osimbidde ssukaalindiizi eyinza okumugaana okumera.
Endu ya ssukaalindiizi enfu nayo eyinza okugaana okumera.
Singa osimba ssukaalindiizi mu musana omungi ennyo ayinza okugaana okumera.
Singa ssukaalindiizi tafuna mazzi gamala mu ttaka era tamera.
Obuwuka obuli mu ttaka singa bulya endu era ssukaalindiizi tamera.
Singa ssukaalindiizi ayokyebwa oluyiira era ayonooneka.
Omulimi alina okubeera omwegendereza ennyo ng'alabirira ssukaalindiizi we.
Si kya tteeka nti ssukaalindiizi bw'amera nti olwo ogenda kumufunamu.
Oyinza okusimba ssukaalindiizi n'amera naye omusana bwe gumukwata era n'afa.
Omusajja oyo yasimba ssukaalindiizi naye yakona.
Waliwo ssukaalindiizi lw'amera kyokka n'agaana okuwanvuwa.
Omusana kimu ku bintu ebigaana ssukaalindiizi okuwanvuwa.
Kiki ekirala ekiviira ssukaalindiizi okukonzibira mu nnimiro.
Enkuba esukkiridde yo erina buzibu ki ku ssukaalindiizi?
Lwaki kigambibwa nti musana gwokka gwe gusinga okukonzibya ssukaalindiizi?
Ettaka lyo teririna kye likola ku kukonziba kwa ssukaalindiizi?
Kiki ekiyinza okutuukawo singa osimba ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Lwaki omulimi yandisimbye ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Wali olabye ku muntu abazizza ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Kiki ekiyinza okuwaliriza omuntu okulima ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Omuntu asimbye ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka ly'olunnyo ayinza kukola atya okumufunamu?
Omuntu asimbye ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka ly'olunnyo ayinza okuviiramu awo.
Omulimi yantegeeza nti ssukaalindiizi gwe yasimba yayengera ebikoola.
Kiki ekiviirako ebikoola bya ssukaalindiizi okufuuka ebya kyenvu?
Buli ssukaalindiizi lw'abeera n'ebikoola ebya kyenvu omanya waliwo ekirungo ekibula mu ttaka.
Lwaki tukubirizibwa obutasimba ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka lya lunnyo?
Omulimisa yangaana okusimba ssukaalindiizi mu kifo ekyo.
Bw'osimba ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka ly'olunnyo omuteekamu ssente nnyingi.
Ekigimusa kigenda kingi nnyo ku ssukaalindiizi asimbiddwa ku ttaka ery'olunnyo.
Ebbeeyi y'ekigimusa kya ssukaalindiizi eri waggulu nnyo.
Ettaka ly'olunnyo terisobola kuddako bulungi ssukaalindiizi.
Buli lw'olima ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka eritaliimu biriisa bimala akusala.
Buli lw'olima ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka ery'olunnyo muteekamu ssente nnyingi.
Gy'okoma okuteeka ssente mu bigimusa bya ssukaalindiizi gy'okoma okukendeeza amagoba.
Ettaka kw'ogenda okusimba ssukaalindiizi walikebera?
Kya nkizo nnyo n'osimba ssukaalindiizi ku ttaka eddungi.
Bulijjo tukubirizibwa okuwebuuza ku balimisa nga tetunnasimba birime nga ssukaalindiizi.
Abantu abasinga balowooza tebasaanye kwebuuza nga basimba ssukaalindiizi.
Lwaki omulimi yandibadde akabeza ettaka kw'agenda okulima ssukaalindiizi?
Kiki ekiyinza okutuukawo singa nsimba ssukaalindiizi nga ssikebedde ttaka?
Omulimi asimba ssukaalindiizi nga takebezza ttaka aba amenye tteeka ki?
Nze bukyanga nsimba ssukaalindiizi ssikebezanga ku ttaka.
Okwebuuza ku mulimisa nga sinnasimba ssukaalindiizi ono kyannyamba nnyo.
Buli lw'olisimba ssukaalindiizi mu kiseera ky'omusana kimanye nti akusaze.
Olina okuteeba ekiseera ky'okusimbiramu ssukaalindiizi ekituufu.
Ensuba esaanye ebeera ng'etonnya mu kiseera ky'osimbiramu ssukaalindiizi wo.
Topapa kusimba ssukaalindiizi olw'okuba olabye enkuba esooka.
Enkuba esooka oluusi ewubya nnyo abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi.
Enkuba bw'etonnya sooka weebuuze ku mulimisa oba osaanye osimbe ssukaalindiizi wo.
Buli lw'opapa okusimba ssukaalindiizi oluusi ofundikira ofiiriddwa.
Obulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi kati mbukugukiddemu ddala.
Nze omu ku balimi abasinga okulima ssukaalindiizi mu ggwanga.
Era nze nkiikirira abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi ku lukiiko lwaffe olw'abalimi.
Tewali kiyinza kugenda mu maaso ku bulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi nga ssikimanyiiko.
Nze omu ku balimi abeebuuzibwako ku bikwata ku ssukaalindiizi.
Tulafuubanye nnyo okukulaakulanya obulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi mu ggwanga.
Abantu abamu baasooka kutugaya nga tutandika okulima ssukaalindiizi.
Nze nnali mumalirivu nnyo era nze nnasooka okulima ssukaalindiizi ku mutala guno.
Tolina kubulwa ssente ng'ate osobola okuziggya mu ssukaalindiizi.
Obulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi buyimiridde butya eyo ewammwe?
Eyo ewammwe ssukaalindiizi mumusimba mu kiseera ki?
Nsigo ya ssukaalindiizi ki gye musinga okusimba eyo ewammwe?
Gavumenti ebayambye etya mu bulimi bwammwe obwa ssukaalindiizi?
Lwaki tetulina mateeka galambika nnima ya ssukaalindiizi mu ggwanga?
Obudde bwe tumala nga tulima ssukaalindiizi bungi nnyo.
Abagula ssukaalindiizi basaanye beekube mu mitima batuwe ku ssente eziwera.
Tekiba kya bwenkanya omuntu okutwala ssukaalindiizi wo nga takuwadde ssente.
Abasuubuzi ba ssukaalindiizi abasinga batulyazaamaanya.
Ssente ze wateeka mu kulima ssukaalindiizi waziggya wa?
Waliwo lwe nneewola ssente ne nziteeka mu kulima ssukaalindiizi.
Okulima ssukaalindiizi tekwandibadde kuzibu naye tetulina bigimusa.
N'okufuna akatale ka ssukaalindiizi eno ewaffe osiitaana.
Abantu bangi baasimba ssukaalindiizi naye batubidde naye.
Lwaki gavumenti tetugulaako ssukaalindiizi waffe.
Ebbeeyi ya ssukaalindiizi eri wansi nnyo.
Gavumenti eteekewo bbeeyi ya ssukaalindiizi gye baba balina okumugulirako.
Gavumenti tevuddeeyo kuyamba balimi ba ssukaalindiizi.
Osanga gavumenti bw'eteekawo omuwendo ogugulirwako ssukaalindiizi tunaaganyulwa.
Abatalima ssukaalindiizi ate be basinga okumufumamu.
Nja kuva ku kulima ssukaalindiizi ntandike kusuubula awedde.
Ebbeeyi ya ssukaalindiizi yatuuka ekiseera n'ennemerera.
Abatugulako ssukaalindiizi babeera nga abatuyamba obuyambi.
Ebbanga lye nnamala mu bulimi bwa ssukaalindiizi lyantamya obulimi.
Omusuubuzi wa ssukaalindiizi afunira ddala okusinga eyalima.
Omusuubuzi wa ssukaalindiizi anyigiriza nnyo omuli.
Naye lwaki omusuubuzi wa ssukaalindiizi anyigiriza nnyo omulimi?
Omusuubuzi wa ssukaalindiizi bw'akimaya nti olina akizibu awo nga kumpi agenda kutwala wa bwereere.
Abalimi ba ssukaalindiizi be balina okugereka ebbeeyi kwe batundira.
Ggwe ssukaalindiizi wo wamutundira ku bbeeyi ki?
Kiki ekyakusikiriza okutundira ssukaalindiizi ku bbeeyi eya wansi?
Ssente ze nnafuna mu ssukaalindiizi kyenkana nninga ataalima.
Tewali kinnyiiza nga muntu kutuuka ku ssukaalindiizi wange n'amulekawo.
Abasuubuzi ba ssukaalindiizi mu butuufu batuwa ssente ntono nnyo.
Kisoboka omulimi okulima ssukaalindiizi mu lutobazi?
Wandisembye mulimi munno okulima ssukaalindiizi mu lutobazi?
Buzibu ki obuyinza okutuukawo singa olima ssukaalindiizi mu lutobazi?
Ate omulimi ayinza kutuuka ku birungi ki singa alima ssukaalindiizi mu lutobazi?
Omuntu alimye ssukaalindiizi mu lutobazi ayinza kumulabirira atya?
Olusaalu olwo njagala okusimbamu ssukaalindiizi.
Ettaka ly'awo ggimu era lirabika okuddako ssukaalindiizi.
Omulundi gwe wasembayo okulima ssukaalindiizi wamufunamu ssente mmeka?
Okyajjukira lwe wasemba okulima ssukaalindiizi?
Emitendera gy'okulima ssukaalindiizi ngimanyi bulungi nnyo.
Mpaawo kye magezi ga kikugu ge nneetaaga okulima ssukaalindiizi.
Nsobola okuteeba obudde bwange obw'okusimbiramu ssukaalindiizi.
Njagala kuddamu kulima ssukaalindiizi.
Yiika yange eyo yonna ngenda kugirimako ssukaalindiizi.
Waliwo ensonga nnyingi lwaki nnalima ssukaalindiizi oyo.
Waliwo ensonga lwaki nnava mu kulima ssukaalindiizi.
Ebbanga lye nnalimira ssukaalindiizi mpaawo kye nnamufumu.
Abantu bangi bagaggawalidde mu kulima ssukaalindiizi.
Ensi z'ebweru nnyingi nnyo eziyaayaanira ssukaalindiizi waffe.
Nze omu mu balimi abaabangulwa mu kulima ssukaalindiizi.
Mmaliridde okuddamu okulima ssukaalindiizi.
Edda twafunanga nnyo ssente mu kulima ssukaalindiizi.
Sooka ogimuse ennimiro nga tonnagisimbamu ssukaalindiizi.
Njagala kusimba ssukaalindiizi akula amangu.
Tosobola kulumwa bwanvu ate ng'osobola okusimba ssukaalindiizi wo.
Okulima ssukaalindiizi oyinza okugamba nnasomakusome.
Obulwadde bwa ssukaalindiizi butawaanya nnyo abalimi eno ewaffe.
Bulwadde bwa ssukaalindiizi ki obusinga okutawaanya abalimi?
Ebintu ebisoomooza abali ba ssukaalindiizi bijja kukolwako gavumenti.
Biki ebiviiriddeko okulima kwa ssukaalindiizi okukendeera mu ggwanga?
Okuttukiza obulimi bwa bbogoya mu uganda.
Olina okulaba nti bbogoya asimbiddwa ku ttaka eddungi.
Njagala kulima ku bbogoya yekka.
Omusana gukosezza nnyo bbogoya wange.
Lwaki enkuba enkuba ennyingi eyonoona bbogoya?
Buli lunaku nteekwa okutuukako mu nnimiro yange eya bbogoya.
Abaana abato basaanye basome ku kulima bbogoya.
Kyandibadde kirungi n'olimayo ku bbogoya.
Ekirime kya bbogoya kinyoomebwa naye kirimu ssente.
Omusajja oyo anyoomebwa naye alima nyo bbogoya.
Okusooka twali tetumanyi nti okulima bbogoya mulimu ssente.
Ssaawa zino bbogoya wange atudde ku yiika ttaano.
Ekitundu kino kye kisinga okulima bbogoya omulungi.
Bulwadde ki obusinga okutawaanya bbogoya wo?
Buli mulimi asaanya akozese ekigimusa kya bbogoya kye yeekakasa.
Obadde okimanyi nti nnatandika dda okulima bbogoya?
Gavumenti etuteereddewo akatale ka bbogoya mu ggwanga.
Buli maka gasaanye galime bbogoya amala.
Tolowooza mu okulima bbogoya tekuliimu ssente.
Abaana bange bonna baagala nnyo okulya bbogoya.
Abaana be baagala nnyo okulya bbogoya.
Ffe twasooka okulima bbogoya wano mu uganda.
Lwaki obadde toyagala kulima bbogoya.
Abagula bbogoya batwongeremu ku ssente.
Buli yiika ya bbogoya erina okugendako ebikolo ebiwera.
Omwana oyo alabiridde bulungi ennimiro ye eya bbogoya.
Abantu abasinga balowooza okulima bbogoya buba butamanya.
Obudde buno mbadde nkusuubira kubeera ng'okoola bbogoya.
Lwaki awo tosooka n'olimawo bbogoya?
Okulimisa enkumbi mu bbogoya kwanguwa nnyo.
Omusajja oyo yalagajjalira nnyo bbogoya we.
Omukazi tasobola kulima bbogoya mungi.
Olina okulabirira bulungi bbogoya wo.
Lwaki oluddewo okukoola bbogoya wo?
Kisaana buli muntu alime bbogoya awera.
Gavumenti tefudde akatale ka bbogoya.
Endu ya bbogoya gye yasimba yali nnungi nnyo.
Eyo ewammwe ani asinga okulima bbogoya?
Lwaki abaana balya nnyo bbogoya?
Okukuza omwana nga tamanyi wadde okusimba bbogoya kibi nnyo.
Abaana b'amasomero abamu tebamanyi kusimba bbogoya.
Abayizi abasinga tebalimanga ku bbogoya.
Okulima bbogoya nagwo mulimu ogufunira ddala.
Eyo ewammwe bbogoya ali ku bbeeyi ki?
Lwaki abasuubuzi baagala nnyo okudondola abalimi ba bbogoya?
Mu budde buno mbadde nkusuubira kuba mu bbogoya wo.
Omulimi wa bbogoya afuna mangu ssente.
Lwaki abakyala abo tebeegatta ne balimira wamu bbogoya?
Ensonga y'okulima bbogoya erina obutasaagirwamu.
Babadde balowooza nti okulima bbogoya kugenda kunsala.
Kiki ekiviiriddeko abantu okukendeeza okulima bbogoya?
Nnatuuse mu bbogoya wange ng'alabika bulungi.
Obudde buli lwe bukya nnyongera okwagala okulima bbogoya.
Okulima bbogoya nakwo kweetaagamu okukozesa ekigimusa.
Abantu bangi balima bbogoya naye ne baviiramu awo.
Abaganda abaatusooka okulima bbogoya baalaba nga kya mugaso.
Ebbeeyi entono egenda kutuggya ku bbogoya.
Lwaki bbogoya tatambula nnyo mu katale?
Okuteeka omusolo ku bintu ebikozesebwa mu kulima bbogoya si kirungi.
Okulima bbogoya nakwo kuwaniridde ebyenfuna by'eggwanga.
Ffenna tulina okufaayo ku kulima bbogoya.
Lwaki obulimi bwa bbogoya bukendedde nnyo mu ggwanga?
Nteekwa okulya ku bbogoya oyo kuba muwoomu nnyo.
Enkuba yasaanyizzaawo gwe ogwa bbogoya.
Buli muzadde atunuulidde bbogoya mu kiseera kino okuliisa abaana.
Abaali bangaya nga nnima bbogoya muli wa?
Fuba nnyo okukola buli ekyetaagisa mu bbogoya wo.
Muddo ki ogusinga okutawaanya bbogoya wo?
Olina okukoola obulungi bbogoya wo.
Ani yakugamba nti eddagala lino terisobola kukoola bbogoya?
Ennaku zino bbogoya basinga kumukooza ddagala.
Omulimi w'omulembe guno takoola bbogoya na nkumbi kuba kirwisa nnya.
Lwaki abantu tebaaga kukoola bbogoya na nkumbi.
Okunoonyereza okukoleddwa ku nnima ya bbogoya tekumala.
Biki bye tweetaaga okufaako nga tulima bbogoya?
Oyo bbogoya akulira ku bbanga ki?
Tweetaaga enkuba bbogoya waffe akule bulungi.
Oli bbogoya gwe wampadde wamuggye wa?
Amaka mangi gaagala nnyo okulima bbogoya.
Obudde bw'okulima bbogoya bukyaliko nnyo.
Abazadde bangi beetamwa obbogoya.
Ebintu bingi ebyatuggya ku kulima bbogoya.
Lwaki totandika okutegeka w'onaalima bbogoya?
Buli muzadde kati atunuulidde bbogoya we.
Ekiwuka ekyo nakyo kitawaanya nnyo bbogoya.
Ddagala ki erisinga okukoola bbogoya?
Buli kadde ke nfuna nga nkoolayo ekikolo kya bbogoya kimu.
Edda baalimanga nnyo bbogoya.
Lwaki ebiwuka byonoona nnyo bbogoya.
Olina okufuba okukuuma ennyo bbogoya wo.
Singa tokuuma bbogoya wo kimanye ojja kuviiramu awo.
Abantu ababba bbogoya nabo twabasalira dda amagezi.
Buli budde bw'omala nga tosimba bbogoya obeera okeerewa.
Abasimbye bbogoya ekikeerezi bayinza obutafunamu.
Omusana ogwase okumala ebbanga era ne gwonoona bbogoya wange.
Obadde wano oyagala kulimawo bbogoya?
Buli bbogoya gwe nsimba yenna akala.
Muteeke ekigimusa ekituufu ku bbogoya wammwe.

Ekigimusa kya nnakavundira nkikozesa nnyo ku bbogoya.
Weewale nnyo obutagimusa bbogoya wo.
Lwaki endwadde za bbogoya temuzifunira ddagala?
Embeera y'obudde eno etusobozesa okusimba bbogoya.
Buli maka agaasimba bbogoya gaafunamu nnyo.

Ettaka lyaffe lino liddako nnyo bbogoya.

Omulembe guno gulimye nnyo bbogoya era gujja kufunamu.

Obudde buno nnina okubeera nga nkungula bbogoya wange?
Ettaka lyo eryo lisobola okuddako bbogoya?
Buli lwe ntambula mbuuza balimi bannange ku bikwata ku bbogoya.
Abakadde abasinga baagala nnyo bbogoya.
Okulima bbogoya kusaanye kuteekebwemu tekinologiya kyanguyize abalimi.

Waliwo ekirwadde ekitawaanya bbogoya wange.
Abalimi ba bbogoya tebafuddeeyo kumwongerako mutindo.
Buli alina bbogoya mu ssaawa zino ali mu ssente.

Ebiseera bino tulina okubeera nga tulima bbogoya.

Omuddo ogubeera mu bbogoya gumukosa nnyo.

Buli lw'olwawo okukungula bbogoya ayonoone.

Ekika kya bbogoya kino tekyeetaaga kuteekako kigimusa.
Ekika kya bbogoya ekyakoleddwa kiriko nnyo ku katale.
Ani ayinza okutufunira akatale ka bbogoya waffe?
Simba bbogoya wadde tonnaba kufuna katale.
Omulimi wa bbogoya asaanye afeeyo ku kunoonya akatale.
Buli lw'osimba bbogoya n'otanoonya katale ayinza okukudibirira.
Abantu bangi abasobola okuwa bbogoya gwe tusimba akatale.
Ettaka lino lindabikira obutaddako bbogoya.
Lwaki olowooza ettaka lino teriddako bbogoya?
Weewale okusimba bbogoya nga tosoose kukebera ttaka.

Bw'okebera ettaka nga tonnasimba bbogoya omanya ebirungo ebiri mu ttaka.
Omulimi akebedde ettaka nga tannasimba bbogoya era asobola okumanya ebirungo ebitali mu ttaka.
Ekirungo ekitali mu ttaka osobola okukiteekamu nga tonnasimba bbogoya.
Ebirungo ebiri mu ttaka bye bibaza bbogoya.
Era ebirungo ebitali mu ttaka bye bigaana bbogoya okubala.
Emirundi egimu ebirungo bino bisobola okugaana bbogoya okumera.
Ebbulwa ly'ebirungo mu ttaka kisobola okulemesa bbogoya okuwanvuwa.
Ebirungo by'omu ttaka bwe bibaamu nga bingi olwo bbogoya aba ajja kubala.

Buli lw'osimba bbogoya mu kitundu ekirimu akasana faayo nnyo okumufukirira.

Endu ya bbogoya olina kugiggya mu batunzi b'endu abakakasiddwa.
Si buli gw'oba ng'atunda endu za bbogoya nti atunda ntuufu.

Kika kya bbogoya ki ky'oyagala okusiga?
Maama wo yasimba kika kya bbogoya ki?
Maama waabwe yagaana okulima bbogoya kati yejjusa.
Tojja kusobola kuweerera baana abo nga tolima bbogoya.
Obugagga obuli mu bbogoya tewali ayinza kubukutendera.
Buli lw'olowooza ku kirime ekifuna ekiralu lowooza ku bbogoya.

Maama yagaana okuddamu okulima bbogoya okuva lwe yamusala.
Omwaka gwe nnalima bbogoya n'ansala yantamisa okulima.

Abatera okutunda bbogoya olumu batera okufunamu ennyo.

Njagala kufunayo akadde nnoonyeze bbogoya wange akatale.

Fuba okulaba nti weebuuza ku balimi banno ku ky'otamanyi ku bbogoya.

Okulima bbogoya okumazeemu bbanga ki?
Ffe twasooka bbogoya w'ekika kino mu kitundu kino.
Omwaka oguwedde bbogoya wange yatuukira mu kidibo.
Abantu bangi baabonaabona nnyo ne bbogoya omwaka oguwedde.
Ggwe bbogoya wo wamutunda wa?
Ani yakuzigirira akatale ka bbogoya we kaali?
Lwaki tewambuulirako gye watunda bbogoya wo?
Bw'ofuna akatale ka bbogoya nange ontemyako.
Bannange abalima bbogoya nnabafunira akatale.
Toyinza kufuna katale ka bbogoya n'okotoggera mulimi munno.
Abalimi ba bbogoya bakolagana nnyo.
Abalimi ba bbogoya okukolagana kubayambye okukulaakulana.
Buli lw'olima bbogoya nga tolina nkolagana ne banno ayinza okukudibirira.
Ffenna twalima bbogoya naye obweraliikirivu bwatuli ku katale ke.
Bwe twakizuula nti tetulina katale ka bbogoya ne tutandika okukanoonya.
Mu kunoonya akatale ka bbogoya era twasanga okusoomoozebwa kungi.
Ani asinga okugula bbogoya eyo mu kitundu kyammwe.
Omusajja eyali agula bbogoya eno ewaffe yafa.
Omusajja eyali agula bbogoya waffe yali atudondola nnyo.
Bw'olima bbogoya omungi abamu bagutwala ng'omukisa okukudondola.
Osobola okulima bbogoya ne weerabira olunaku lwe wamusimba.
Nze sijjukira ddagala lye nnafuuyira ku bbogoya wange.
Ekigimusa kye nnakozesa ku bbogoya ono nakyo nnakyerabira.
Buli lw'okoseza ekigimusa ekisukkiridde ku bbogoya ayonooneka.
Okunoonya akatale ka bbogoya bwe bwetaavu bwe tusinga okubeera nabwo.
Omukulembeze w'eggwanga yatusuubiza okutufunira akatale ka bbogoya.
Tubanguddwa mu ngeri y'okwongera omutindo ku bbogoya.
We twogerera bbogoya waffe akwata ekifo kya kumwanjo nnyo ku katale k'ensi yonna.
Amawanga g'ebweru gatandise okusuubula bbogoya waffe.
Ennaku zino bbogoya waffe ayagalwa buli ggwanga.
Eggwanga erigaana bbogoya waffe liba terimanyi kye lyagala.
Naffe tukimanyi nti omutindo gwa bbogoya waffe mulungi.
Kiki ekiviirako omutindo ogwa wansi mu bbogoya?
Abalimi balina kukola ki okutumbula omutindo gwa bbogoya?
Lupimo ki oluliwo kw'osinziira okulaba nti bbogoya ono mulungi?
Bwe mbeera situukirizza lupimo olwo ku bbogoya wange kiki ekikolebwa?
Abantu bangi tebamanyi birungi biri mu kulima bbogoya?
Ebirungi ebiri mu kulima bbogoya wabizuula otya?
Lwaki mu birime byonna era walondawo bbogoya?
Oteekeddwa okuba ng'olina ekyakusikiriza okulima bbogoya.
Ani yakuyingiza mu bulimi bwa bbogoya?
Ani yakusikiriza okutandika okulima bbogoya?
Birungi ki by'ofunye okuva lwe watandika okulima bbogoya?
Osuubira onaakoma ddi okulima bbogoya?
Wali olowoozezza ku kuwummula obulimi bwa bbogoya?
Ettaka liteekeddwa kulimibwako bbogoya emirundi emeka?
Buli lwe ssirima bbogoya mbulwa nnyo ssente ewaka.
Oteekeddwa okukimanya nti okulima bbogoya kwava dda wano mu uganda.
Ekibbattaka kigootaanyizza obulimi bwa bbogoya eno ewaffe.
Ekitundu kyaffe kimanyiddwa lwa bulimi bwa bbogoya.
Singa twali tetulima nnyo bbogoya abantu tebanditutegedde.
Ggwanga ki erisinga okulima bbogoya mu nsi yonna?
Omulimi alina okukimanya nti bbogoya asobola okufa singa tamulabirira bulungi.
Ebintu ebiyinza okutta bbogoya bingi nnyo.
Biki by'omanyi ebiyinza okuviirako bbogoya obutamera.
Embeera y'obudde embi mw'osimbidde bbogoya eyinza okumugaana okumera.
Endu ya bbogoya enfu nayo eyinza okugaana okumera.
Singa osimba bbogoya mu musana omungi ennyo ayinza okugaana okumera.
Singa bbogoya tafuna mazzi gamala mu ttaka era tamera.
Obuwuka obuli mu ttaka singa bulya endu era bbogoya tamera.
Singa bbogoya ayokyebwa oluyiira era ayonooneka.
Omulimi alina okubeera omwegendereza ennyo ng'alabirira bbogoya we.
Si kya tteeka nti bbogoya bw'amera nti olwo ogenda kumufunamu.
Oyinza okusimba bbogoya n'amera naye omusana bwe gumukwata era n'afa.
Omusajja oyo yasimba bbogoya naye yakona.
Waliwo bbogoya lw'amera kyokka n'agaana okuwanvuwa.
Omusana kimu ku bintu ebigaana bbogoya okuwanvuwa.
Kiki ekirala ekiviira bbogoya okukonzibira mu nnimiro.
Enkuba esukkiridde yo erina buzibu ki ku bbogoya?
Lwaki kigambibwa nti musana gwokka gwe gusinga okukonzibya bbogoya?
Ettaka lyo teririna kye likola ku kukonziba kwa bbogoya?
Kiki ekiyinza okutuukawo singa osimba bbogoya ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Lwaki omulimi yandisimbye bbogoya ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Wali olabye ku muntu abazizza bbogoya ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Kiki ekiyinza okuwaliriza omuntu okulima bbogoya ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Omuntu asimbye bbogoya ku ttaka ly'olunnyo ayinza kukola atya okumufunamu?
Omuntu asimbye bbogoya ku ttaka ly'olunnyo ayinza okuviiramu awo.
Omulimi yantegeeza nti bbogoya gwe yasimba yayengera ebikoola.
Kiki ekiviirako ebikoola bya bbogoya okufuuka ebya kyenvu?
Buli bbogoya lw'abeera n'ebikoola ebya kyenvu omanya waliwo ekirungo ekibula mu ttaka.
Lwaki tukubirizibwa obutasimba bbogoya ku ttaka lya lunnyo?
Omulimisa yangaana okusimba bbogoya mu kifo ekyo.
Bw'osimba bbogoya ku ttaka ly'olunnyo omuteekamu ssente nnyingi.
Ekigimusa kigenda kingi nnyo ku bbogoya asimbiddwa ku ttaka ery'olunnyo.
Ebbeeyi y'ekigimusa kya bbogoya eri waggulu nnyo.
Ettaka ly'olunnyo terisobola kuddako bulungi bbogoya.
Buli lw'olima bbogoya ku ttaka eritaliimu biriisa bimala akusala.
Buli lw'olima bbogoya ku ttaka ery'olunnyo muteekamu ssente nnyingi.
Gy'okoma okuteeka ssente mu bigimusa bya bbogoya gy'okoma okukendeeza amagoba.
Ettaka kw'ogenda okusimba bbogoya walikebera?
Kya nkizo nnyo n'osimba bbogoya ku ttaka eddungi.
Bulijjo tukubirizibwa okuwebuuza ku balimisa nga tetunnasimba birime nga bbogoya.
Abantu abasinga balowooza tebasaanye kwebuuza nga basimba bbogoya.
Lwaki omulimi yandibadde akabeza ettaka kw'agenda okulima bbogoya?
Kiki ekiyinza okutuukawo singa nsimba bbogoya nga ssikebedde ttaka?
Omulimi asimba bbogoya nga takebezza ttaka aba amenye tteeka ki?
Nze bukyanga nsimba bbogoya ssikebezanga ku ttaka.
Okwebuuza ku mulimisa nga sinnasimba bbogoya ono kyannyamba nnyo.
Buli lw'olisimba bbogoya mu kiseera ky'omusana kimanye nti akusaze.
Olina okuteeba ekiseera ky'okusimbiramu bbogoya ekituufu.
Ensuba esaanye ebeera ng'etonnya mu kiseera ky'osimbiramu bbogoya wo.
Topapa kusimba bbogoya olw'okuba olabye enkuba esooka.
Enkuba esooka oluusi ewubya nnyo abalimi ba bbogoya.
Enkuba bw'etonnya sooka weebuuze ku mulimisa oba osaanye osimbe bbogoya wo.
Buli lw'opapa okusimba bbogoya oluusi ofundikira ofiiriddwa.
Obulimi bwa bbogoya kati mbukugukiddemu ddala.
Nze omu ku balimi abasinga okulima bbogoya mu ggwanga.
Era nze nkiikirira abalimi ba bbogoya ku lukiiko lwaffe olw'abalimi.
Tewali kiyinza kugenda mu maaso ku bulimi bwa bbogoya nga ssikimanyiiko.
Nze omu ku balimi abeebuuzibwako ku bikwata ku bbogoya.
Tulafuubanye nnyo okukulaakulanya obulimi bwa bbogoya mu ggwanga.
Abantu abamu baasooka kutugaya nga tutandika okulima bbogoya.
Nze nnali mumalirivu nnyo era nze nnasooka okulima bbogoya ku mutala guno.
Tolina kubulwa ssente ng'ate osobola okuziggya mu bbogoya.
Obulimi bwa bbogoya buyimiridde butya eyo ewammwe?
Eyo ewammwe bbogoya mumusimba mu kiseera ki?
Nsigo ya bbogoya ki gye musinga okusimba eyo ewammwe?
Gavumenti ebayambye etya mu bulimi bwammwe obwa bbogoya?
Lwaki tetulina mateeka galambika nnima ya bbogoya mu ggwanga?
Obudde bwe tumala nga tulima bbogoya bungi nnyo.
Abagula bbogoya basaanye beekube mu mitima batuwe ku ssente eziwera.
Tekiba kya bwenkanya omuntu okutwala bbogoya wo nga takuwadde ssente.
Abasuubuzi ba bbogoya abasinga batulyazaamaanya.
Ssente ze wateeka mu kulima bbogoya waziggya wa?
Waliwo lwe nneewola ssente ne nziteeka mu kulima bbogoya.
Okulima bbogoya tekwandibadde kuzibu naye tetulina bigimusa.
N'okufuna akatale ka bbogoya eno ewaffe osiitaana.
Abantu bangi baasimba bbogoya naye batubidde naye.
Lwaki gavumenti tetugulaako bbogoya waffe.
Ebbeeyi ya bbogoya eri wansi nnyo.
Gavumenti eteekewo bbeeyi ya bbogoya gye baba balina okumugulirako.
Gavumenti tevuddeeyo kuyamba balimi ba bbogoya.
Osanga gavumenti bw'eteekawo omuwendo ogugulirwako bbogoya tunaaganyulwa.
Abatalima bbogoya ate be basinga okumufumamu.
Nja kuva ku kulima bbogoya ntandike kusuubula awedde.
Ebbeeyi ya bbogoya yatuuka ekiseera n'ennemerera.
Abatugulako bbogoya babeera nga abatuyamba obuyambi.
Ebbanga lye nnamala mu bulimi bwa bbogoya lyantamya obulimi.
Omusuubuzi wa bbogoya afunira ddala okusinga eyalima.
Omusuubuzi wa bbogoya anyigiriza nnyo omuli.
Naye lwaki omusuubuzi wa bbogoya anyigiriza nnyo omulimi?
Omusuubuzi wa bbogoya bw'akimaya nti olina akizibu awo nga kumpi agenda kutwala wa bwereere.
Abalimi ba bbogoya be balina okugereka ebbeeyi kwe batundira.
Ggwe bbogoya wo wamutundira ku bbeeyi ki?
Kiki ekyakusikiriza okutundira bbogoya ku bbeeyi eya wansi?
Ssente ze nnafuna mu bbogoya kyenkana nninga ataalima.
Tewali kinnyiiza nga muntu kutuuka ku bbogoya wange n'amulekawo.
Abasuubuzi ba bbogoya mu butuufu batuwa ssente ntono nnyo.
Kisoboka omulimi okulima bbogoya mu lutobazi?
Wandisembye mulimi munno okulima bbogoya mu lutobazi?
Buzibu ki obuyinza okutuukawo singa olima bbogoya mu lutobazi?
Ate omulimi ayinza kutuuka ku birungi ki singa alima bbogoya mu lutobazi?
Omuntu alimye bbogoya mu lutobazi ayinza kumulabirira atya?
Olusaalu olwo njagala okusimbamu bbogoya.
Ettaka ly'awo ggimu era lirabika okuddako bbogoya.
Omulundi gwe wasembayo okulima bbogoya wamufunamu ssente mmeka?
Okyajjukira lwe wasemba okulima bbogoya?
Emitendera gy'okulima bbogoya ngimanyi bulungi nnyo.
Mpaawo kye magezi ga kikugu ge nneetaaga okulima bbogoya.
Nsobola okuteeba obudde bwange obw'okusimbiramu bbogoya.
Njagala kuddamu kulima bbogoya.
Yiika yange eyo yonna ngenda kugirimako bbogoya.
Waliwo ensonga nnyingi lwaki nnalima bbogoya oyo.
Waliwo ensonga lwaki nnava mu kulima bbogoya.
Ebbanga lye nnalimira bbogoya mpaawo kye nnamufumu.
Abantu bangi bagaggawalidde mu kulima bbogoya.
Ensi z'ebweru nnyingi nnyo eziyaayaanira bbogoya waffe.
Nze omu mu balimi abaabangulwa mu kulima bbogoya.
Mmaliridde okuddamu okulima bbogoya.
Edda twafunanga nnyo ssente mu kulima bbogoya.
Sooka ogimuse ennimiro nga tonnagisimbamu bbogoya.
Njagala kusimba bbogoya akula amangu.
Tosobola kulumwa bwanvu ate ng'osobola okusimba bbogoya wo.
Okulima bbogoya oyinza okugamba nnasomakusome.
Obulwadde bwa bbogoya butawaanya nnyo abalimi eno ewaffe.
Bulwadde bwa bbogoya ki obusinga okutawaanya abalimi?
Ebintu ebisoomooza abali ba bbogoya bijja kukolwako gavumenti.
Biki ebiviiriddeko okulima kwa bbogoya okukendeera mu ggwanga?
Okusomesa ku bulimi bwa woovakkedo mu uganda.
Olina okulaba nti woovakkedo asimbiddwa ku ttaka eddungi.
Njagala kulima ku woovakkedo yekka.
Omusana gukosezza nnyo woovakkedo wange.
Lwaki enkuba enkuba ennyingi eyonoona woovakkedo?
Buli lunaku nteekwa okutuukako mu nnimiro yange eya woovakkedo.
Abaana abato basaanye basome ku kulima woovakkedo.
Kyandibadde kirungi n'olimayo ku woovakkedo.
Ekirime kya woovakkedo kinyoomebwa naye kirimu ssente.
Omusajja oyo anyoomebwa naye alima nyo woovakkedo.
Okusooka twali tetumanyi nti okulima woovakkedo mulimu ssente.
Ssaawa zino woovakkedo wange atudde ku yiika ttaano.
Ekitundu kino kye kisinga okulima woovakkedo omulungi.
Bulwadde ki obusinga okutawaanya woovakkedo wo?
Buli mulimi asaanya akozese ekigimusa kya woovakkedo kye yeekakasa.
Obadde okimanyi nti nnatandika dda okulima woovakkedo?
Gavumenti etuteereddewo akatale ka woovakkedo mu ggwanga.
Buli maka gasaanye galime woovakkedo amala.
Tolowooza mu okulima woovakkedo tekuliimu ssente.
Abaana bange bonna baagala nnyo okulya woovakkedo.
Abaana be baagala nnyo okulya woovakkedo.
Ffe twasooka okulima woovakkedo wano mu uganda.
Lwaki obadde toyagala kulima woovakkedo.
Abagula woovakkedo batwongeremu ku ssente.
Buli yiika ya woovakkedo erina okugendako ebikolo ebiwera.

Abantu abasinga balowooza okulima woovakkedo buba butamanya.
Obudde buno mbadde nkusuubira kubeera ng'okoola woovakkedo.
Lwaki awo tosooka n'olimawo woovakkedo?
Okulimisa enkumbi mu woovakkedo kwanguwa nnyo.
Omusajja oyo yalagajjalira nnyo woovakkedo we.

Lwaki oluddewo okukoola woovakkedo wo?

Lwaki abaana balya nnyo woovakkedo?

Abaana b'amasomero abamu tebamanyi kusimba woovakkedo.

Eyo ewammwe woovakkedo ali ku bbeeyi ki?

Mu budde buno mbadde nkusuubira kuba mu woovakkedo wo.
Omulimi wa woovakkedo afuna mangu ssente.
Lwaki abakyala abo tebeegatta ne balimira wamu woovakkedo?
Ensonga y'okulima woovakkedo erina obutasaagirwamu.
Babadde balowooza nti okulima woovakkedo kugenda kunsala.

Abantu bangi balima woovakkedo naye ne baviiramu awo.
Abaganda abaatusooka okulima woovakkedo baalaba nga kya mugaso.
Ebbeeyi entono egenda kutuggya ku woovakkedo.
Lwaki woovakkedo tatambula nnyo mu katale?
Okuteeka omusolo ku bintu ebikozesebwa mu kulima woovakkedo si kirungi.
Okulima woovakkedo nakwo kuwaniridde ebyenfuna by'eggwanga.
Ffenna tulina okufaayo ku kulima woovakkedo.
Lwaki obulimi bwa woovakkedo bukendedde nnyo mu ggwanga?
Nteekwa okulya ku woovakkedo oyo kuba muwoomu nnyo.
Enkuba yasaanyizzaawo gwe ogwa woovakkedo.

Fuba nnyo okukola buli ekyetaagisa mu woovakkedo wo.

Olina okukoola obulungi woovakkedo wo.

Abazadde bangi beetamwa owoovakkedo.

Awantu w'ogenda okusimba woovakkedo sooka okabalewo.
Lwaki batukubiriza okukaba we tugenda okusimba woovakkedo?
Eyakuwa amagezi osimbe woovakkedo osaana owebaze nnyo.
Ate eyakuwa amagezi ove kukulima woovakkedo yali takwagaliza.
Mukyala wange yasanyuka nnyo nga woovakkedo we abaze.
Nsiziira ku ki okumanya nti woovakkedo ono agenda kubala?
Kya bulijjo nti woovakkedo asobola okugaana okubala.
Nnansimbe ntya woovakkedo ono asobole okubala?
Nnina kukola ntya woovakkedo ono asobole okugejja?
Gendera ku magezi omulimisa g'akuwa singa obeera osimba woovakkedo.
Omulimi yenna ava ku magezi g'omulimisa ku nsimba ya woovakkedo talina kwejjusa.
Ono woovakkedo alina kumala bbanga ki mu nnimiro?
Ani alina okusalawo ebbanga ly'okukungulirako woovakkedo?
Njagala kuyiga ngeri ya kusimbamu woovakkedo.
Mwezi ki omulungi okusimbiramu woovakkedo?
Ani yakuwa amagezi okuyingira obulimi bwa woovakkedo?
Olinayo essuubi ly'onna okuva mu bulimi bwa woovakkedo?
Olina essuubi okuddamu okulima woovakkedo?
Bannassaayansi baatandika okumerusa endokwa za woovakkedo.
Okulima woovakkedo nakwo kati kuyingiddemu tekinologiya.
Omuntu ababirira anaalabirira woovakkedo we ajja kumufunamu.
Tewali nkola nnambulukufu ng'ogenda kusimba woovakkedo.
Bannassaayansi baatandika okunoonyereza ku kiwuka ekikaza woovakkedo.
Kikunta eyakunta yayonoona woovakkedo yenna.
Bannassaayansi baazuddeyo ekika kya woovakkedo ekipya.
Ekika kya woovakkedo kino kikula mangu nnyo okusinga ebirala.
Lwaki ekika kya woovakkedo kino tekyataaga nnyo kigimusa?
Ekika kya woovakkedo kino tekyeetaaga kuteekako kigimusa.
Ekika kya woovakkedo ekyakoleddwa kiriko nnyo ku katale.
Ani ayinza okutufunira akatale ka woovakkedo waffe?
Simba woovakkedo wadde tonnaba kufuna katale.
Omulimi wa woovakkedo asaanye afeeyo ku kunoonya akatale.
Buli lw'osimba woovakkedo n'otanoonya katale ayinza okukudibirira.
Abantu bangi abasobola okuwa woovakkedo gwe tusimba akatale.
Ettaka lino lindabikira obutaddako woovakkedo.
Lwaki olowooza ettaka lino teriddako woovakkedo?
Weewale okusimba woovakkedo nga tosoose kukebera ttaka.
Okukebera ettaka nga tonnasimba woovakkedo kikulu nnyo.
Bw'okebera ettaka nga tonnasimba woovakkedo omanya ebirungo ebiri mu ttaka.
Omulimi akebedde ettaka nga tannasimba woovakkedo era asobola okumanya ebirungo ebitali mu ttaka.
Ekirungo ekitali mu ttaka osobola okukiteekamu nga tonnasimba woovakkedo.
Ebirungo ebiri mu ttaka bye bibaza woovakkedo.
Era ebirungo ebitali mu ttaka bye bigaana woovakkedo okubala.
Emirundi egimu ebirungo bino bisobola okugaana woovakkedo okumera.
Ebbulwa ly'ebirungo mu ttaka kisobola okulemesa woovakkedo okuwanvuwa.
Ebirungo by'omu ttaka bwe bibaamu nga bingi olwo woovakkedo aba ajja kubala.
Ekikolo kya woovakkedo kino kirungi nnyo.
Tolaba ng'ekikolo kya woovakkedo kino kyabala nnyo.
Ekikolo kya woovakkedo kino kimazeewo bbanga ki?
Ennimiro ya woovakkedo eno ogisuubiramu ssente mmeka?
Lwaki woovakkedo ono omusuubiramu ssente nnyingi?
Abasuubuzi abaasooka okulima woovakkedo baafunira ddala ssente.
Gavumenti enoonye gy'esobola okutunda woovakkedo waffe.
Omusajja oyo aludde mu bulimi bwa woovakkedo.
Abalimi abamu woovakkedo waabwe bamutundira ku mutimbagano.
Tuli kukola ki okwongera ku katale ka woovakkedo kuno?
Gavumenti esaanye eyambe abalimi ba woovakkedo nabo basobole okumufunamu.
Buli lwe tuzisa woovakkedo tubeera twolekera nja etagambika.
Omuntu atamanyi kirungi kiri mu woovakkedo asaana kubagulizaako.
Kika kya woovakkedo ki ky'oteekateeka okusimba awo?
Fuuyira ekigimusa ky'amazzi ku woovakkedo asobole okubala.
Ekigimusa kya nnakavundira kigezza nnyo woovakkedo.
Ettaka bwe likaddiwa libeera terikyabalako woovakkedo.
Omuntu y'asobola okuwa obudde ekirime kya woovakkedo.
Lwaki ebigimusa bya woovakkedo bya bbula nnyo ensangi zino?
Ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kulima woovakkedo byangu nnyo okufuna.
Ekirime kya woovakkedo kye kimu ku byettanirwa ensangi zino.
Eggwanga lirimu abalimi ba woovakkedo bangi nnyo.
Lwaki woovakkedo wa kati akulira mu bbanga ttono?
Emirembe gye tulina mu ggwanga gitusobozesezza okumalira obudde bwaffe ku woovakkedo.
Embeera woovakkedo ono gy'alimu eweera ddala essanyu.
Ani yakuzigirira nti okulima woovakkedo kulimu nnyo ssente.
Fuba okulaba nti olima woovakkedo ali ku mutindo.
Kigimusa ki ekizungu ekikola ennyo ku woovakkedo ono omupya?
Ettaka kwe twalimanga woovakkedo n'abala kati lyonna likaddiye.
Tolagajjalira kulima woovakkedo kubanga alimu nnyo ekirungo kye tweetaaga.
Kiriisa ki ekisangibwa mu woovakkedo?
Enkya tulinayo okuliiko ng'abalimi ba woovakkedo.
Biteeso ki bye mwayogeddeko ng'abali ba woovakkedo?
Olukiiko lw'abalimi ba woovakkedo lwetabiddwamu omubaka waffe ow'ekitundu.
Omubaka w'ekitundu yagumizza abalimi ba woovakkedo nti ebbeeyi ejja kulinnya.
Twekubidde omulanga eri omubaka waffe atuyambe okutufunira ku katale ka woovakkedo.
Ekirime kya woovakkedo kidda bulungi mu kitundu kino.
Buli lw'osimba woovakkedo mu kitundu ekirimu akasana faayo nnyo okumufukirira.
Omusenyu tegusobola kuddako woovakkedo nga bwe kiri ku ttaka eriddugavu.
Endokwa ya woovakkedo olina kugiggya mu batunzi b'endokwa abakakasiddwa.
Si buli gw'oba ng'atunda endokwa za woovakkedo nti atunda ntuufu.
Okulima woovakkedo kusaanidde okutwalibwa ng'omulimu oguyinza okuggya abantu mu bwavu.
Waliwo eyangamba nti woovakkedo alimibwa bakadde.
Wamma kituufu nti woovakkedo alimibwa bakadde?
Kika kya woovakkedo ki ky'oyagala okusiga?
Maama wo yasimba kika kya woovakkedo ki?
Maama waabwe yagaana okulima woovakkedo kati yejjusa.
Tojja kusobola kuweerera baana abo nga tolima woovakkedo.
Obugagga obuli mu woovakkedo tewali ayinza kubukutendera.
Buli lw'olowooza ku kirime ekifuna ekiralu lowooza ku woovakkedo.
Olina okukimanya nti woovakkedo alimiddwa abantu bangi era ne bamufunamu.
Wabula kino tekiggyawo nti waliwo abalimye woovakkedo n'abasala.
Maama yagaana okuddamu okulima woovakkedo okuva lwe yamusala.
Omwaka gwe nnalima woovakkedo n'ansala yantamisa okulima.
Obulimi bwa woovakkedo bweetaaga omuntu ng'asobola okwerabira ebibaddewo.
Omwaka guno ssigenda kusimba woovakkedo kuba owa luli yansala nnyo.
Olina okumanya ekiruubirirwa kyo nga tonnatandika kulima woovakkedo.
Buli lw'oyingira obulimi bwa woovakkedo nga tolina kiruubirirwa oba tomanyi ky'oyagala.
Obuvunaanyizibwa bwo mu kulima woovakkedo buli wa?
Weetaaga ssente mmeka mu woovakkedo wo?
Omulimi alina n'okubeera n'omuwendo gwa ssente gw'asuubira mu woovakkedo yenna.
Ono woovakkedo yenna ogenda kumutunda lumu?
Abatera okutunda woovakkedo olumu batera okufunamu ennyo.
Lwaki woovakkedo wo tomutunda lumu yenna?
Njagala kufunayo akadde nnoonyeze woovakkedo wange akatale.
Abalimi bangi bajja ne balambula woovakkedo wange.
Abalimi abajja okulambula woovakkedo wange mbawa ku magezi g'okulima woovakkedo.
Buli lw'ogabana amagezi ne balimi banno aba woovakkedo naawe ofuna okumanya.
Amagezi agampeebwa omulimisa gannyambye okubaza woovakkedo.
Fuba okulaba nti weebuuza ku balimi banno ku ky'otamanyi ku woovakkedo.
Lambula ku woovakkedo wo olabe oba taliimu birwadde.
Ebirwadde bya woovakkedo bifiiriza nnyo abalimi.
Okulima woovakkedo okumazeemu bbanga ki?
Ffe twasooka woovakkedo w'ekika kino mu kitundu kino.
Omwaka oguwedde woovakkedo wange yatuukira mu kidibo.
Abantu bangi baabonaabona nnyo ne woovakkedo omwaka oguwedde.
Ggwe woovakkedo wo wamutunda wa?
Ani yakuzigirira akatale ka woovakkedo we kaali?
Lwaki tewambuulirako gye watunda woovakkedo wo?
Bw'ofuna akatale ka woovakkedo nange ontemyako.
Bannange abalima woovakkedo nnabafunira akatale.
Toyinza kufuna katale ka woovakkedo n'okotoggera mulimi munno.
Abalimi ba woovakkedo bakolagana nnyo.
Abalimi ba woovakkedo okukolagana kubayambye okukulaakulana.
Buli lw'olima woovakkedo nga tolina nkolagana ne banno ayinza okukudibirira.
Ffenna twalima woovakkedo naye obweraliikirivu bwatuli ku katale ke.
Bwe twakizuula nti tetulina katale ka woovakkedo ne tutandika okukanoonya.
Mu kunoonya akatale ka woovakkedo era twasanga okusoomoozebwa kungi.
Ani asinga okugula woovakkedo eyo mu kitundu kyammwe.
Omusajja eyali agula woovakkedo eno ewaffe yafa.
Omusajja eyali agula woovakkedo waffe yali atudondola nnyo.
Bw'olima woovakkedo omungi abamu bagutwala ng'omukisa okukudondola.
Osobola okulima woovakkedo ne weerabira olunaku lwe wamusimba.
Nze sijjukira ddagala lye nnafuuyira ku woovakkedo wange.
Ekigimusa kye nnakozesa ku woovakkedo ono nakyo nnakyerabira.
Buli lw'okoseza ekigimusa ekisukkiridde ku woovakkedo ayonooneka.
Okunoonya akatale ka woovakkedo bwe bwetaavu bwe tusinga okubeera nabwo.
Omukulembeze w'eggwanga yatusuubiza okutufunira akatale ka woovakkedo.
Tubanguddwa mu ngeri y'okwongera omutindo ku woovakkedo.
We twogerera woovakkedo waffe akwata ekifo kya kumwanjo nnyo ku katale k'ensi yonna.
Amawanga g'ebweru gatandise okusuubula woovakkedo waffe.
Ennaku zino woovakkedo waffe ayagalwa buli ggwanga.
Eggwanga erigaana woovakkedo waffe liba terimanyi kye lyagala.
Naffe tukimanyi nti omutindo gwa woovakkedo waffe mulungi.
Kiki ekiviirako omutindo ogwa wansi mu woovakkedo?
Abalimi balina kukola ki okutumbula omutindo gwa woovakkedo?
Lupimo ki oluliwo kw'osinziira okulaba nti woovakkedo ono mulungi?
Bwe mbeera situukirizza lupimo olwo ku woovakkedo wange kiki ekikolebwa?
Abantu bangi tebamanyi birungi biri mu kulima woovakkedo?
Ebirungi ebiri mu kulima woovakkedo wabizuula otya?
Lwaki mu birime byonna era walondawo woovakkedo?
Oteekeddwa okuba ng'olina ekyakusikiriza okulima woovakkedo.
Ani yakuyingiza mu bulimi bwa woovakkedo?
Ani yakusikiriza okutandika okulima woovakkedo?
Birungi ki by'ofunye okuva lwe watandika okulima woovakkedo?
Osuubira onaakoma ddi okulima woovakkedo?
Wali olowoozezza ku kuwummula obulimi bwa woovakkedo?
Ettaka liteekeddwa kulimibwako woovakkedo emirundi emeka?
Buli lwe ssirima woovakkedo mbulwa nnyo ssente ewaka.
Oteekeddwa okukimanya nti okulima woovakkedo kwava dda wano mu uganda.
Ekibbattaka kigootaanyizza obulimi bwa woovakkedo eno ewaffe.
Ekitundu kyaffe kimanyiddwa lwa bulimi bwa woovakkedo.
Singa twali tetulima nnyo woovakkedo abantu tebanditutegedde.
Ggwanga ki erisinga okulima woovakkedo mu nsi yonna?
Omulimi alina okukimanya nti woovakkedo asobola okufa singa tamulabirira bulungi.
Ebintu ebiyinza okutta woovakkedo bingi nnyo.
Biki by'omanyi ebiyinza okuviirako woovakkedo obutamera.
Embeera y'obudde embi mw'osimbidde woovakkedo eyinza okumugaana okumera.
Endokwa ya woovakkedo enfu nayo eyinza okugaana okumera.
Singa osimba woovakkedo mu musana omungi ennyo ayinza okugaana okumera.
Singa woovakkedo tafuna mazzi gamala mu ttaka era tamera.
Obuwuka obuli mu ttaka singa bulya endokwa era woovakkedo tamera.
Singa woovakkedo ayokyebwa oluyiira era ayonooneka.
Omulimi alina okubeera omwegendereza ennyo ng'alabirira woovakkedo we.
Si kya tteeka nti woovakkedo bw'amera nti olwo ogenda kumufunamu.
Oyinza okusimba woovakkedo n'amera naye omusana bwe gumukwata era n'afa.
Omusajja oyo yasimba woovakkedo naye yakona.
Waliwo woovakkedo lw'amera kyokka n'agaana okuwanvuwa.
Omusana kimu ku bintu ebigaana woovakkedo okuwanvuwa.
Kiki ekirala ekiviira woovakkedo okukonzibira mu nnimiro.
Enkuba esukkiridde yo erina buzibu ki ku woovakkedo?
Lwaki kigambibwa nti musana gwokka gwe gusinga okukonzibya woovakkedo?
Ettaka lyo teririna kye likola ku kukonziba kwa woovakkedo?
Kiki ekiyinza okutuukawo singa osimba woovakkedo ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Lwaki omulimi yandisimbye woovakkedo ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Wali olabye ku muntu abazizza woovakkedo ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Kiki ekiyinza okuwaliriza omuntu okulima woovakkedo ku ttaka ly'olunnyo?
Omuntu asimbye woovakkedo ku ttaka ly'olunnyo ayinza kukola atya okumufunamu?
Omuntu asimbye woovakkedo ku ttaka ly'olunnyo ayinza okuviiramu awo.
Omulimi yantegeeza nti woovakkedo gwe yasimba yayengera ebikoola.
Kiki ekiviirako ebikoola bya woovakkedo okufuuka ebya kyenvu?
Buli woovakkedo lw'abeera n'ebikoola ebya kyenvu omanya waliwo ekirungo ekibula mu ttaka.
Lwaki tukubirizibwa obutasimba woovakkedo ku ttaka lya lunnyo?
Omulimisa yangaana okusimba woovakkedo mu kifo ekyo.
Bw'osimba woovakkedo ku ttaka ly'olunnyo omuteekamu ssente nnyingi.
Ekigimusa kigenda kingi nnyo ku woovakkedo asimbiddwa ku ttaka ery'olunnyo.
Ebbeeyi y'ekigimusa kya woovakkedo eri waggulu nnyo.
Ettaka ly'olunnyo terisobola kuddako bulungi woovakkedo.
Buli lw'olima woovakkedo ku ttaka eritaliimu biriisa bimala akusala.
Buli lw'olima woovakkedo ku ttaka ery'olunnyo muteekamu ssente nnyingi.
Gy'okoma okuteeka ssente mu bigimusa bya woovakkedo gy'okoma okukendeeza amagoba.
Ettaka kw'ogenda okusimba woovakkedo walikebera?
Kya nkizo nnyo n'osimba woovakkedo ku ttaka eddungi.
Bulijjo tukubirizibwa okuwebuuza ku balimisa nga tetunnasimba birime nga woovakkedo.
Abantu abasinga balowooza tebasaanye kwebuuza nga basimba woovakkedo.
Lwaki omulimi yandibadde akabeza ettaka kw'agenda okulima woovakkedo?
Kiki ekiyinza okutuukawo singa nsimba woovakkedo nga ssikebedde ttaka?
Omulimi asimba woovakkedo nga takebezza ttaka aba amenye tteeka ki?
Nze bukyanga nsimba woovakkedo ssikebezanga ku ttaka.
Okwebuuza ku mulimisa nga sinnasimba woovakkedo ono kyannyamba nnyo.
Buli lw'olisimba woovakkedo mu kiseera ky'omusana kimanye nti akusaze.
Olina okuteeba ekiseera ky'okusimbiramu woovakkedo ekituufu.
Ensuba esaanye ebeera ng'etonnya mu kiseera ky'osimbiramu woovakkedo wo.
Topapa kusimba woovakkedo olw'okuba olabye enkuba esooka.
Enkuba esooka oluusi ewubya nnyo abalimi ba woovakkedo.
Enkuba bw'etonnya sooka weebuuze ku mulimisa oba osaanye osimbe woovakkedo wo.
Buli lw'opapa okusimba woovakkedo oluusi ofundikira ofiiriddwa.
Obulimi bwa woovakkedo kati mbukugukiddemu ddala.
Nze omu ku balimi abasinga okulima woovakkedo mu ggwanga.
Era nze nkiikirira abalimi ba woovakkedo ku lukiiko lwaffe olw'abalimi.
Tewali kiyinza kugenda mu maaso ku bulimi bwa woovakkedo nga ssikimanyiiko.
Nze omu ku balimi abeebuuzibwako ku bikwata ku woovakkedo.
Tulafuubanye nnyo okukulaakulanya obulimi bwa woovakkedo mu ggwanga.
Abantu abamu baasooka kutugaya nga tutandika okulima woovakkedo.
Nze nnali mumalirivu nnyo era nze nnasooka okulima woovakkedo ku mutala guno.
Tolina kubulwa ssente ng'ate osobola okuziggya mu woovakkedo.
Obulimi bwa woovakkedo buyimiridde butya eyo ewammwe?
Eyo ewammwe woovakkedo mumusimba mu kiseera ki?
Nsigo ya woovakkedo ki gye musinga okusimba eyo ewammwe?
Gavumenti ebayambye etya mu bulimi bwammwe obwa woovakkedo?
Lwaki tetulina mateeka galambika nnima ya woovakkedo mu ggwanga?
Obudde bwe tumala nga tulima woovakkedo bungi nnyo.
Abagula woovakkedo basaanye beekube mu mitima batuwe ku ssente eziwera.
Tekiba kya bwenkanya omuntu okutwala woovakkedo wo nga takuwadde ssente.
Abasuubuzi ba woovakkedo abasinga batulyazaamaanya.
Ssente ze wateeka mu kulima woovakkedo waziggya wa?
Waliwo lwe nneewola ssente ne nziteeka mu kulima woovakkedo.
Okulima woovakkedo tekwandibadde kuzibu naye tetulina bigimusa.
N'okufuna akatale ka woovakkedo eno ewaffe osiitaana.
Abantu bangi baasimba woovakkedo naye batubidde naye.
Lwaki gavumenti tetugulaako woovakkedo waffe.
Ebbeeyi ya woovakkedo eri wansi nnyo.
Gavumenti eteekewo bbeeyi ya woovakkedo gye baba balina okumugulirako.
Gavumenti tevuddeeyo kuyamba balimi ba woovakkedo.
Osanga gavumenti bw'eteekawo omuwendo ogugulirwako woovakkedo tunaaganyulwa.
Abatalima woovakkedo ate be basinga okumufumamu.
Nja kuva ku kulima woovakkedo ntandike kusuubula awedde.
Ebbeeyi ya woovakkedo yatuuka ekiseera n'ennemerera.
Abatugulako woovakkedo babeera nga abatuyamba obuyambi.
Ebbanga lye nnamala mu bulimi bwa woovakkedo lyantamya obulimi.
Omusuubuzi wa woovakkedo afunira ddala okusinga eyalima.
Omusuubuzi wa woovakkedo anyigiriza nnyo omuli.
Naye lwaki omusuubuzi wa woovakkedo anyigiriza nnyo omulimi?
Omusuubuzi wa woovakkedo bw'akimaya nti olina akizibu awo nga kumpi agenda kutwala wa bwereere.
Abalimi ba woovakkedo be balina okugereka ebbeeyi kwe batundira.
Ggwe woovakkedo wo wamutundira ku bbeeyi ki?
Kiki ekyakusikiriza okutundira woovakkedo ku bbeeyi eya wansi?
Ssente ze nnafuna mu woovakkedo kyenkana nninga ataalima.
Tewali kinnyiiza nga muntu kutuuka ku woovakkedo wange n'amulekawo.
Abasuubuzi ba woovakkedo mu butuufu batuwa ssente ntono nnyo.
Kisoboka omulimi okulima woovakkedo mu lutobazi?
Wandisembye mulimi munno okulima woovakkedo mu lutobazi?
Buzibu ki obuyinza okutuukawo singa olima woovakkedo mu lutobazi?
Ate omulimi ayinza kutuuka ku birungi ki singa alima woovakkedo mu lutobazi?
Omuntu alimye woovakkedo mu lutobazi ayinza kumulabirira atya?
Olusaalu olwo njagala okusimbamu woovakkedo.
Ettaka ly'awo ggimu era lirabika okuddako woovakkedo.
Omulundi gwe wasembayo okulima woovakkedo wamufunamu ssente mmeka?
Okyajjukira lwe wasemba okulima woovakkedo?
Emitendera gy'okulima woovakkedo ngimanyi bulungi nnyo.
Mpaawo kye magezi ga kikugu ge nneetaaga okulima woovakkedo.
Nsobola okuteeba obudde bwange obw'okusimbiramu woovakkedo.
Njagala kuddamu kulima woovakkedo.
Yiika yange eyo yonna ngenda kugirimako woovakkedo.
Waliwo ensonga nnyingi lwaki nnalima woovakkedo oyo.
Waliwo ensonga lwaki nnava mu kulima woovakkedo.
Ebbanga lye nnalimira woovakkedo mpaawo kye nnamufumu.
Abantu bangi bagaggawalidde mu kulima woovakkedo.
Ensi z'ebweru nnyingi nnyo eziyaayaanira woovakkedo waffe.
Nze omu mu balimi abaabangulwa mu kulima woovakkedo.
Mmaliridde okuddamu okulima woovakkedo.
Edda twafunanga nnyo ssente mu kulima woovakkedo.
Sooka ogimuse ennimiro nga tonnagisimbamu woovakkedo.
Njagala kusimba woovakkedo akula amangu.
Tosobola kulumwa bwanvu ate ng'osobola okusimba woovakkedo wo.
Okulima woovakkedo oyinza okugamba nnasomakusome.
Obulwadde bwa woovakkedo butawaanya nnyo abalimi eno ewaffe.
Bulwadde bwa woovakkedo ki obusinga okutawaanya abalimi?
Ebintu ebisoomooza abali ba woovakkedo bijja kukolwako gavumenti.
Biki ebiviiriddeko okulima kwa woovakkedo okukendeera mu ggwanga?
Okubuulira abantu bulimi bwa ffene mu uganda.
Olina okulaba nti ffene asimbiddwa ku ttaka eddungi.
Njagala kulima ku ffene yekka.
Omusana gukosezza nnyo ffene wange.
Lwaki enkuba enkuba ennyingi eyonoona ffene?
Buli lunaku nteekwa okutuukako mu nnimiro yange eya ffene.
Abaana abato basaanye basome ku kulima ffene.
Kyandibadde kirungi n'olimayo ku ffene.
Ekirime kya ffene kinyoomebwa naye kirimu ssente.
Omusajja oyo anyoomebwa naye alima nyo ffene.
Okusooka twali tetumanyi nti okulima ffene mulimu ssente.
Ssaawa zino ffene wange atudde ku yiika ttaano.
Ekitundu kino kye kisinga okulima ffene omulungi.
Bulwadde ki obusinga okutawaanya ffene wo?
Buli mulimi asaanya akozese ekigimusa kya ffene kye yeekakasa.
Obadde okimanyi nti nnatandika dda okulima ffene?
Gavumenti etuteereddewo akatale ka ffene mu ggwanga.
Buli maka gasaanye galime ffene amala.
Tolowooza mu okulima ffene tekuliimu ssente.
Abaana bange bonna baagala nnyo okulya ffene.
Abaana be baagala nnyo okulya ffene.
Ffe twasooka okulima ffene wano mu uganda.
Lwaki obadde toyagala kulima ffene.
Abagula ffene batwongeremu ku ssente.
Buli yiika ya ffene erina okugendako ebikolo ebiwera.
Omwana oyo alabiridde bulungi ennimiro ye eya ffene.
Abantu abasinga balowooza okulima ffene buba butamanya.
Obudde buno mbadde nkusuubira kubeera ng'okoola ffene.
Lwaki awo tosooka n'olimawo ffene?
Okulimisa enkumbi mu ffene kwanguwa nnyo.
Omusajja oyo yalagajjalira nnyo ffene we.
Omukazi tasobola kulima ffene mungi.
Olina okulabirira bulungi ffene wo.
Lwaki oluddewo okukoola ffene wo?
Kisaana buli muntu alime ffene awera.
Gavumenti tefudde akatale ka ffene.
Endokwa ya ffene gye yasimba yali nnungi nnyo.

Lwaki abaana balya nnyo ffene?

Lwaki abasuubuzi baagala nnyo okudondola abalimi ba ffene?
Mu budde buno mbadde nkusuubira kuba mu ffene wo.
Omulimi wa ffene afuna mangu ssente.
Lwaki abakyala abo tebeegatta ne balimira wamu ffene?

Babadde balowooza nti okulima ffene kugenda kunsala.
Kiki ekiviiriddeko abantu okukendeeza okulima ffene?
Nnatuuse mu ffene wange ng'alabika bulungi.
Obudde buli lwe bukya nnyongera okwagala okulima ffene.
Okulima ffene nakwo kweetaagamu okukozesa ekigimusa.
Abantu bangi balima ffene naye ne baviiramu awo.
Abaganda abaatusooka okulima ffene baalaba nga kya mugaso.
Ebbeeyi entono egenda kutuggya ku ffene.
Lwaki ffene tatambula nnyo mu katale?
Okuteeka omusolo ku bintu ebikozesebwa mu kulima ffene si kirungi.
Okulima ffene nakwo kuwaniridde ebyenfuna by'eggwanga.
Ffenna tulina okufaayo ku kulima ffene.
Lwaki obulimi bwa ffene bukendedde nnyo mu ggwanga?
Nteekwa okulya ku ffene oyo kuba muwoomu nnyo.
Enkuba yasaanyizzaawo gwe ogwa ffene.
Buli muzadde atunuulidde ffene mu kiseera kino okuliisa abaana.
Abaali bangaya nga nnima ffene muli wa?
Fuba nnyo okukola buli ekyetaagisa mu ffene wo.
Muddo ki ogusinga okutawaanya ffene wo?
Olina okukoola obulungi ffene wo.

Ennaku zino ffene basinga kumukooza ddagala.
Omulimi w'omulembe guno takoola ffene na nkumbi kuba kirwisa nnya.

Biki bye tweetaaga okufaako nga tulima ffene?
Oyo ffene akulira ku bbanga ki?
Tweetaaga enkuba ffene waffe akule bulungi.
Oli ffene gwe wampadde wamuggye wa?

Buli muzadde kati atunuulidde ffene we.

Buli kadde ke nfuna nga nkoolayo ekikolo kya ffene kimu.
Edda baalimanga nnyo ffene.
Lwaki ebiwuka byonoona nnyo ffene.
Olina okufuba okukuuma ennyo ffene wo.

Buli budde bw'omala nga tosimba ffene obeera okeerewa.

Ettaka lyaffe lino liddako nnyo ffene.

Omulembe guno gulimye nnyo ffene era gujja kufunamu.

Obudde buno nnina okubeera nga nkungula ffene wange?

Buli lwe ntambula mbuuza balimi bannange ku bikwata ku ffene.

Okulima ffene kusaanye kuteekebwemu tekinologiya kyanguyize abalimi.

Buli alina ffene mu ssaawa zino ali mu ssente.

Ebiseera bino tulina okubeera nga tulima ffene.

Kirime ki ky'osobola okusimba awantu ewavudde ffene?
Lwaki ffene wo wamuwa amabanga matono nnyo?
Omuddo ogubeera mu ffene gumukosa nnyo.
Omuddo ogwo ogubeera mu ffene gweetaaga ne gukoolebwa mangu.

Oteekeddwa okwebuuza ku mulimisa ku bikwata ku ffene.

Totereka kigimusa kya ffene wantu wayiika mazzi kuba kiba kifa.

Ddagala ki eriyinza okutta ekiwuka ekikaza ffene?
Buli lw'olwawo okukungula ffene ayonoone.
Muddo ki ogutalina buzibu ku ffene?
Omuddo tegulina buzibu ku ffene wange?

Ettaka lyaffe lino liddako bulungi ffene.
Omwaka guno ssibazidda ffene era ssisuubira kufunamu nnyo.
Lwaki awantu awo tosimbawo ffene?
Enkuba gye tusuubira okutonnya ejja kutuyamba ku ffene waffe.
Omuzira ogwatukuba gwayonoona nnyo ffene waffe.
Omuntu amanyi obukulu bw'okulima ffene talumbibwa njala.
Abalimi ba ffene balabuddwa ku kyeya kye bayolekedde.

Ebintu ebyonoona ffene bifiiriza nnyo abalimi baffe.
Lwaki abalimi ba ffene batono nnyo mu biseera bino?

Olina okwebuuza ku mulimisa nga tonnasimba ffene.
Kigimusa ki kye wakozesa ku ffene wo?

Omuntu ayagala okulima ffene alina kukola atya?
Omuntu ayagala okulima ffene oyinza kumuwa magezi ki?
Faayo okulaba ng'osimba ffene anaabala obulungi.
Omuntu asimbye endokwa ya ffene n'etamera oyinza kumuwabula otya?

Biki ebirina okufiibwako ng'onaasimba ffene?
Tulina ebika bya ffene bimeka wano mu uganda?
Olina kwerinda bintu ki singa obeera olima ffene?
Lwaki ekika kya ffene ekyo kiwanvuwa nnyo?
Mpaayo ekika kya ffene ky'omanyi ekitawanvuwa.
Mpulira bubi nnyo olw'okuba ffene wange yagaana okumera.
Mbeera ki eyeetaagisa okusimbiramu ffene?
Bw'olaba osimbye ffene faayo okumukoola nga bukyali?
Oyo ffene ateekeddwa kulabirirwa mu ngeri ki?
Fuba nnyo okulaba nti ffene tazika.
Buli ffene lw'azika kiteeka enfunayo ng'omulimi mu katyabaga.
Awantu w'ogenda okusimba ffene sooka okabalewo.
Lwaki batukubiriza okukaba we tugenda okusimba ffene?
Eyakuwa amagezi osimbe ffene osaana owebaze nnyo.
Ate eyakuwa amagezi ove kukulima ffene yali takwagaliza.
Mukyala wange yasanyuka nnyo nga ffene we abaze.
Nsiziira ku ki okumanya nti ffene ono agenda kubala?
Kya bulijjo nti ffene asobola okugaana okubala.
Nnansimbe ntya ffene ono asobole okubala?
Nnina kukola ntya ffene ono asobole okugejja?
Gendera ku magezi omulimisa g'akuwa singa obeera osimba ffene.
Omulimi yenna ava ku magezi g'omulimisa ku nsimba ya ffene talina kwejjusa.
